GP12skp031pu:5: prayāge parame puṇye brahmaṇo lokavartmani // SkP_1.3 //
GP12skp031pu:16: kathitaṃ bhāratākhyānaṃ purāṇaṃ ca paraṃ tvayā /
GP12skp031pu:17: tena naḥ pratibhāsi tvaṃ sākṣātsatyavatīsutaḥ // SkP_1.9 //
GP12skp031pu:19: dvijapūjārato nityaṃ tena pṛcchāṃ tvamarhasi // SkP_1.10 //
GP12skp031pu:21: tattvā pṛcchāma vai janma kārttikeyasya dhīmataḥ // SkP_1.11 //
GP12skp031pu:27: brahmaṇyatvaṃ samāhātmyaṃ vīryaṃ ca tridaśādhikam // SkP_1.14 //
GP12skp031pu:31: vicaransa tadā lokān muniḥ satyavatīsutaḥ // SkP_1.16 //
GP12skp031pu:39: vavande parayā bhaktyā sākṣādiva pitāmaham // SkP_1.20 //
GP12skp031pu:41: pariṣvajya paraṃ premṇā provāca vacanaṃ śubham // SkP_1.21 //
GP12skp031pu:45: idamāha vaco viprāś ciraṃ yaddhṛdaye sthitam // SkP_1.23 //
GP12skp031pu:47: kiṃnimittaṃ kuto vāsya icchāmyetaddhi veditum // SkP_1.24 //
GP12skp031pu:50: suparṇyāścātha mātṝṇāṃ kṛttikānāṃ kathaṃ ca saḥ // SkP_1.25 //
GP12skp031pu:53: sūta uvāca evaṃ sa pṛṣṭastejasvī brahmaṇaḥ putrasattamaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:59: mahādevaṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvasya jagataḥ patim // SkP_2.1 //
GP12skp031pu:61: svāmitvaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca svakṛtāni pracakṣate // SkP_2.2 //
GP12skp031pu:62: tasmai devāya somāya praṇamya prayataḥ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:69: śarvasya darśanaṃ caiva devyāścaiva samudbhavaḥ // SkP_2.6 //
GP12skp031pu:71: menāyāṃ ca yathotpattir yathā devyāḥ svayaṃvaram // SkP_2.7 //
GP12skp031pu:72: devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca vasiṣṭhasya ca dhīmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:73: parāśarasya cotpattir vyāsasya ca mahātmanaḥ // SkP_2.8 //
GP12skp031pu:77: gaṇānāṃ darśanaṃ caiva kathanaṃ cāpyaśeṣataḥ // SkP_2.10 //
GP12skp031pu:83: agastyasya ca māhātmyaṃ vadhaḥ sundanisundayoḥ // SkP_2.13 //
GP12skp031pu:88: balisaṃyamanaṃ caiva devyāḥ samaya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:89: devānāṃ gamanaṃ caiva agnerdūtatvameva ca // SkP_2.16 //
GP12skp031pu:90: devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca śukrasya ca visarjanam /
GP12skp031pu:93: āryāvarapradānaṃ ca śailādistava eva ca // SkP_2.18 //
GP12skp031pu:105: nigraho bhujagendrāṇāṃ śikharasya ca pātanam // SkP_2.24 //
GP12skp031pu:109: vadhaśca tārakasyogro yātrā bhadravaṭasya ca // SkP_2.26 //
GP12skp031pu:111: śakteruddharaṇaṃ caiva tārakasya vadhaḥ śubhaḥ // SkP_2.27 //
GP12skp031pu:119: sanatkumāra uvāca śṛṇuṣvemāṃ kathāṃ divyāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanīm /
GP12skp031pu:121: yāṃ śrutvā pāpakarmāpi gacchecca paramāṃ gatim // SkP_3.1 //
GP12skp031pu:123: imāṃ kathāmanubrūyāt tathā cāsūyake nare // SkP_3.2 //
GP12skp031pu:126: kumārabhaktāya tathā śraddadhānāya caiva hi // SkP_3.3 //
GP12skp031pu:128: so 'jñānātpitaraṃ brahmā na veda tamasāvṛtaḥ // SkP_3.4 //
GP12skp031pu:131: putra putreti cāpyukto brahmā śarveṇa dhīmatā /
GP12skp031pu:132: praṇataḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tameva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // SkP_3.6 //
GP12skp031pu:133: sa dattvā brahmaṇe śambhuḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ jñānasaṃhitam /
GP12skp031pu:134: vibhutvaṃ caiva lokānām antardhe parameśvaraḥ // SkP_3.7 //
GP12skp031pu:136: yāṃ śrutvā yogino dhyānāt prapadyante maheśvaram // SkP_3.8 //
GP12skp031pu:137: brahmaṃ ca yo vidadhe putramagre jñānaṃ ca yaḥ prahiṇoti sma tasmai /
GP12skp031pu:138: tamātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām //
GP12skp031pu:139: sa vyāsa pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā svadīptyā parayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:140: putrakāmaḥ prajāhetos tapastīvraṃ cakāra ha // SkP_3.10 //
GP12skp031pu:142: acireṇaiva kālena pitā sampratutoṣa ha // SkP_3.11 //
GP12skp031pu:144: sa tuṣṭāva nato bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim // SkP_3.12 //
GP12skp031pu:146: sraṣṭre vai lokatantrāya brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ // SkP_3.13 //
GP12skp031pu:152: dṛṣṭidāya ca sarveṣāṃ svayaṃ vai darśanāya ca // SkP_3.16 //
GP12skp031pu:154: manasaḥ karaṇānāṃ ca tatraiva niyamasya ca // SkP_3.17 //
GP12skp031pu:155: bhūtānāṃ guṇakartre ca śaktidāya tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:156: kartre hyaṇḍasya mahyaṃ ca acintyāyāgrajāya ca /
GP12skp031pu:157: aprameya pitarnityaṃ prīto no diśa śakvarīm // SkP_3.18 //
GP12skp031pu:159: tuṣṭo 'bravītsvayaṃ putraṃ brahmāṇaṃ praṇataṃ tathā // SkP_3.19 //
GP12skp031pu:161: tasmādbrahmeti lokeṣu nāmnā khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi // SkP_3.20 //
GP12skp031pu:163: tasmātpitāmahatvaṃ te loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // SkP_3.21 //
GP12skp031pu:164: prajārthaṃ yacca te taptaṃ tapa ugraṃ suduścaram /
GP12skp031pu:168: bhāvāśca sarve te devam upatasthuḥ svarūpiṇaḥ // SkP_3.23 //
GP12skp031pu:171: tābhiḥ svaṃ svaṃ samādāya bhāvaṃ divyamatarkitam /
GP12skp031pu:173: tatraivaṃ yoginaḥ sūkṣmaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:175: rudraḥ sraṣṭā hi sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ tava ca prabho /
GP12skp031pu:181: sarveṣāṃ manasi sadāvatiṣṭhamāno jānānaḥ śubhamaśubhaṃ ca bhūtanāthaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:182: taṃ devaṃ pramathapatiṃ praṇamya bhaktyā nityaṃ vai śaraṇamupaimi sūkṣmasūkṣmam // SkP_3.30
GP12skp031pu:185: sanatkumāra uvāca prājāpatyaṃ tato labdhvā prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame /
GP12skp031pu:186: prajāstāḥ sṛjyamānāśca na vivardhanti tasya ha // SkP_4.1 //
GP12skp031pu:188: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ bhūya evātha tapaścartuṃ pracakrame // SkP_4.2 //
GP12skp031pu:194: śambhuḥ prāha varaṃ vatsa yācasveti pitāmaham // SkP_4.4 //
GP12skp031pu:196: sa jñātvā tasya saṃkalpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:197: mūḍho 'yamiti saṃcintya provāca varadaḥ svayam // SkP_4.5 //
GP12skp031pu:198: āgataṃ pitaraṃ mā tvaṃ yasmātputraṃ samīhase /
GP12skp031pu:200: sa ca te putratāṃ yātvā madīyo gaṇanāyakaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:201: rudro vigrahavānbhūtvā mūḍha tvāṃ vinayiṣyati // SkP_4.7 //
GP12skp031pu:203: balasyādhipatitvaṃ ca astrāṇāṃ ca prayoktṛtā // SkP_4.8 //
GP12skp031pu:205: dhanuḥ pinākaṃ śūlaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ paraśureva ca // SkP_4.9 //
GP12skp031pu:208: evaṃ sarvarddhisampannaḥ sutaste sa bhaviṣyati // SkP_4.10 //
GP12skp031pu:210: brahmā cakre tadā ceṣṭiṃ putrakāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ // SkP_4.11 //
GP12skp031pu:212: samidyuktena hastena lalāṭaṃ pramamārja ha // SkP_4.12 //
GP12skp031pu:214: papāta jvalane tasmin dviguṇaṃ tasya tejasā // SkP_4.13 //
GP12skp031pu:215: taddhi māheśvaraṃ tejaḥ saṃdhitaṃ brahmaṇi srutam /
GP12skp031pu:218: preṣito gaṇapo rudraḥ sadya evābhavattadā // SkP_4.15 //
GP12skp031pu:222: tryakṣo daśabhujaḥ śrīmān brahmāṇaṃ chādayanniva // SkP_4.17 //
GP12skp031pu:224: stutvā taṃ sarvagaṃ devaṃ nīlalohitamavyayam // SkP_4.18 //
GP12skp031pu:226: asṛjadvividhāstvanyāḥ prajāḥ sa jagati prabhuḥ // SkP_4.19 //
GP12skp031pu:231: atha kālena mahatā kalpe 'tīte punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:232: prajā dhārayato yogād asminkalpa upasthite // SkP_4.22 //
GP12skp031pu:234: prajāsu ca vivṛddhāsu prayāge yajataśca ha // SkP_4.23 //
GP12skp031pu:240: khinnā vivadamānāśca na ca paśyāma yatparam // SkP_4.26 //
GP12skp031pu:241: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ deva ciraṃ hṛdi samāsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:242: tvaṃ hi vettha yathātattvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ hi naḥ // SkP_4.27 //
GP12skp031pu:244: kena cādhiṣṭhitaṃ viśvaṃ ko nityaḥ kaśca śāśvataḥ // SkP_4.28 //
GP12skp031pu:248: kathaṃ paśyema taṃ caiva etannaḥ śaṃsa sarvaśaḥ // SkP_4.30 //
GP12skp031pu:250: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām // SkP_4.31 //
GP12skp031pu:251: yakṣāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca ye ca kutra pravartakāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:253: utthāya prāñjaliḥ prāha rudreti triḥ plutaṃ vacaḥ // SkP_4.32 //
GP12skp031pu:254: sa cāpi tapasā śakyo draṣṭuṃ nānyena kenacit /
GP12skp031pu:256: tasya vaśyāni bhūtāni tenedaṃ dhāryate jagat // SkP_4.33 //
GP12skp031pu:258: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kiṃ tanmahattapo deva yena dṛśyeta sa prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:259: tanno vadasva deveśa varadaṃ cābhidhatsva naḥ // SkP_4.35 //
GP12skp031pu:261: deśaṃ ca vaḥ pravakṣyāmi yasmindeśe cariṣyatha // SkP_4.36 //
GP12skp031pu:262: tato manomayaṃ cakraṃ sa sṛṣṭvā tānuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:263: kṣiptametanmayā cakram anuvrajata mā ciram // SkP_4.37 //
GP12skp031pu:264: yatrāsya nemiḥ śīryeta sa deśastapasaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:265: tato mumoca taccakraṃ te ca tatsamanuvrajan // SkP_4.38 //
GP12skp031pu:266: tasya vai vrajataḥ kṣipraṃ yatra nemiraśīryata /
GP12skp031pu:267: naimiśaṃ tatsmṛtaṃ nāmnā puṇyaṃ sarvatra pūjitam // SkP_4.39 //
GP12skp031pu:270: vipraiśca dāntaiḥ śamayogayuktais tīrthaiśca sarvairapi cāvanīdhraiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:271: gandharvavidyādharacāraṇaiśca sādhyaiśca viśvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ stutaṃ ca //
GP12skp031pu:274: sanatkumāra uvāca tannaimiśaṃ samāsādya ṛṣayo dīptatejasaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:279: sarvakriyāḥ prakurvāṇās tameva manasā gatāḥ // SkP_5.3 //
GP12skp031pu:282: dadau sa rūpī bhagavān darśanaṃ sattriṇāṃ śubhaḥ // SkP_5.4 //
GP12skp031pu:285: papracchurudbhavaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagataḥ pralayaṃ tathā // SkP_5.5 //
GP12skp031pu:286: sthitiṃ ca kṛtsnāṃ vaṃśāṃśca yugamanvantarāṇi ca /
GP12skp031pu:287: vaṃśānucaritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ divyamānaṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_5.6 //
GP12skp031pu:289: pitṛsargaṃ tathāśeṣaṃ brahmaṇo mānameva ca // SkP_5.7 //
GP12skp031pu:294: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca teṣāṃ tadabhiyāttathā // SkP_5.9 //
GP12skp031pu:308: tāmapṛcchanta kā nveṣā vāyuṃ devaṃ mahādhiyam // SkP_5.16 //
GP12skp031pu:310: śuddhāḥ stha tapasā sarve mahāndharmaśca vaḥ kṛtaḥ // SkP_5.17 //
GP12skp031pu:314: nāsyāḥ puṇyatamā kācit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate // SkP_5.19 //
GP12skp031pu:315: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathameṣā mahāpuṇyā pravṛttā brahmalokagā /
GP12skp031pu:316: kāraṇaṃ kiṃ ca tatrāsīd etadicchāma veditum // SkP_5.20 //
GP12skp031pu:317: vāyuruvāca atra vo vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam /
GP12skp031pu:318: brahmaṇaścaiva saṃvādaṃ purā yajñasya caiva ha // SkP_5.21 //
GP12skp031pu:319: yajñairiṣṭvā purā devo brahmā dīptena tejasā /
GP12skp031pu:321: sa dṛṣṭvā dīptimāndevo dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:324: amanyata na me 'nyo 'sti samo loke na cādhikaḥ // SkP_5.24 //
GP12skp031pu:327: ahaṃ sraṣṭā hi bhūtānāṃ nānyaḥ kaścana vidyate /
GP12skp031pu:328: niyantā lokakartā ca na mayāsti samaḥ kvacit // SkP_5.26 //
GP12skp031pu:330: uvāca cainaṃ dīptātmā maivaṃ maṃsthā mahāmate /
GP12skp031pu:331: ayaṃ hi tava saṃmoho vināśāya bhaviṣyati // SkP_5.27 //
GP12skp031pu:333: sraṣṭā tvaṃ caiva nānyo 'sti tathāpi na yaśaskaram // SkP_5.28 //
GP12skp031pu:334: ahaṃ kartā hi bhūtānāṃ bhuvanasya tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:335: karomi na ca saṃmohaṃ yathā tvaṃ deva katthase // SkP_5.29 //
GP12skp031pu:336: tamuvāca tadā brahmā na tvaṃ dhārayitā vibho /
GP12skp031pu:337: ahameva hi bhūtānāṃ dhartā bhartā tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:338: mayā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni tvamevātra vimuhyase // SkP_5.30 //
GP12skp031pu:340: uvāca caiva tau vedo naitadevamiti prabhuḥ // SkP_5.31 //
GP12skp031pu:341: ahaṃ śreṣṭho mahābhāgau na vadāmyanṛtaṃ kvacit /
GP12skp031pu:342: śṛṇudhvaṃ mama yaḥ kartā bhūtānāṃ yuvayośca ha // SkP_5.32 //
GP12skp031pu:344: yenāhaṃ tava dattaśca kṛtastvaṃ ca prajāpatiḥ // SkP_5.33 //
GP12skp031pu:346: sarvaṃ tasmātprasūtaṃ vai nānyaḥ kartāsti naḥ kvacit // SkP_5.34 //
GP12skp031pu:348: ahaṃ śrutīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ netā sraṣṭā tathaiva ca // SkP_5.35 //
GP12skp031pu:352: evamukte tadā tena mahāñchabdo babhūva ha /
GP12skp031pu:357: vyomagaśca ciraṃ bhūtvā bhūmigaḥ sambabhūva ha // SkP_5.38 //
GP12skp031pu:358: tato brahmā diśaḥ sarvā nirīkṣya mukhapaṅkajaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:359: caturbhirna viyatsthaṃ tam apaśyatsa pitāmahaḥ // SkP_5.39 //
GP12skp031pu:360: sa mukhaṃ pañcamaṃ dīptam asṛjanmūrdhni saṃsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:363: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcamaṃ tasya śiro vai krodhajaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:368: cakarta tanmahadghoraṃ brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ // SkP_5.43 //
GP12skp031pu:371: tataḥ suptotthita iva saṃjñāṃ labdhvā mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:373: brahmovāca namaḥ sahasranetrāya śatanetrāya vai namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:374: namo vivṛtavaktrāya śatavaktrāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.46 //
GP12skp031pu:376: namaḥ sahasrapādāya sarvapādāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.47 //
GP12skp031pu:378: namaḥ sarvasya sraṣṭre ca draṣṭre sarvasya te namaḥ // SkP_5.48 //
GP12skp031pu:380: sṛṣṭipralayakartre ca sthitikartre tathā namaḥ // SkP_5.49 //
GP12skp031pu:382: saṃhāraliṅgine caiva jalaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.50 //
GP12skp031pu:386: bhūtabhavyāya śarvāya nityaṃ sattvavadāya ca // SkP_5.52 //
GP12skp031pu:387: tvameva sraṣṭā lokānāṃ mantā dātā tathā vibho /
GP12skp031pu:389: tasyaivaṃ stuvataḥ samyag bhāvena parameṇa ha /
GP12skp031pu:390: sa tasmai devadeveśo divyaṃ cakṣuradāttadā // SkP_5.54 //
GP12skp031pu:391: cakṣuṣā tena sa tadā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:395: viśadāṃ putra putreti pūrvaṃ devena coditām // SkP_5.56 //
GP12skp031pu:397: yacca pūrvaṃ mayā proktas tvaṃ tadā sutamārgaṇe // SkP_5.57 //
GP12skp031pu:399: sa prāpya paramaṃ jñānaṃ mūḍha tvā vinayiṣyati // SkP_5.58 //
GP12skp031pu:401: mayaiva kāritā tena nirvṛtaścādhunā bhava // SkP_5.59 //
GP12skp031pu:404: stavenānena tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ dadāni ca te 'nagha // SkP_5.60 //
GP12skp031pu:405: vāyuruvāca tataḥ sa bhagavānhṛṣṭaḥ praṇamya śubhayā girā /
GP12skp031pu:408: icchāmi śiraso hyasya dhāraṇaṃ sarvadā tvayā /
GP12skp031pu:411: tathā ca kṛtyamuddiśya paśyeyaṃ tvā yathāsukham // SkP_5.63 //
GP12skp031pu:414: śiraśchetsyati yajñasya bibhartsyati śiraśca te // SkP_5.64 //
GP12skp031pu:417: sayajñaḥ sahavedaśca svaṃ lokaṃ pratyapadyata // SkP_5.65 //
GP12skp031pu:418: vāyuruvāca ya imaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo guhyaṃ vedārthasaṃmitam /
GP12skp031pu:419: sa dehabhedamāsādya sāyujyaṃ brahmaṇo vrajet // SkP_5.66 //
GP12skp031pu:423: ākhyeyaṃ nāpi cājñāya na śaṭhāya na mānine // SkP_5.68 //
GP12skp031pu:425: kṛtāvakāśo bhavatīha mānavaḥ śarīrabhede praviśetpitāmaham // SkP_5.69 //
GP12skp031pu:428: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa bhagavāndevaḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:429: ājñayā parameśasya jagrāha brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ // SkP_6.1 //
GP12skp031pu:431: yogakrīḍāṃ samāsthāya bhaikṣāya pracacāra ha // SkP_6.2 //
GP12skp031pu:433: na cāsya kaścittāṃ bhikṣām anurūpāmadādvibhoḥ // SkP_6.3 //
GP12skp031pu:436: sa dṛṣṭvā tadupasthaṃ tu viṣṇurvai yogacakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:438: papāta sā ca vistīrṇā yojanārdhaśataṃ tadā // SkP_6.5 //
GP12skp031pu:441: tamuvāca tato devaḥ prahasya vacanaṃ śubham // SkP_6.6 //
GP12skp031pu:445: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varado 'smi tavādya vai // SkP_6.8 //
GP12skp031pu:446: viṣṇuruvāca eṣa eva varaḥ ślāghyo yadahaṃ devatādhipam /
GP12skp031pu:447: paśyāmi śaṃkaraṃ devam ugraṃ śarvaṃ kapardinam // SkP_6.9 //
GP12skp031pu:448: devaśchāyāṃ tato vīkṣya kapālasthe tadā rase /
GP12skp031pu:449: sasarja puruṣaṃ dīptaṃ viṣṇoḥ sadṛśamūrjitam // SkP_6.10 //
GP12skp031pu:452: devakāryakaraḥ śrīmān sahānena carasva ca // SkP_6.11 //
GP12skp031pu:454: narastasmāddhi nāmnā tvaṃ priyaścāsya bhaviṣyasi // SkP_6.12 //
GP12skp031pu:455: vāyuruvāca taṃ tadāśvāsya nikṣipya naraṃ viṣṇoḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:457: ya idaṃ narajanmeha śṛṇuyādvā paṭheta vā /
GP12skp031pu:458: sa kīrtyā parayā yukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate // SkP_6.14 //
GP12skp031pu:462: bhaikṣyaṃ bhaikṣyamiti procya dvāre samavatiṣṭhata // SkP_7.1 //
GP12skp031pu:464: jñātvā yogena mahatā tuṣṭāva bhuvaneśvaram // SkP_7.2 //
GP12skp031pu:466: vṛṇīṣva varamavyagro yaste manasi vartate // SkP_7.3 //
GP12skp031pu:467: brahmovāca icchāmi devadeveśa tvayā cihnamidaṃ kṛtam /
GP12skp031pu:468: yena cihnena loko 'yaṃ cihnitaḥ syājjagatpate // SkP_7.4 //
GP12skp031pu:470: sarvaśrutimayaṃ brahma omiti vyājahāra ha // SkP_7.5 //
GP12skp031pu:478: imaṃ lokaṃ varāmbhobhiḥ pāvayitvā ca suprabhe /
GP12skp031pu:479: sarvāṃl lokāṃstārayitrī punastvaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // SkP_7.9 //
GP12skp031pu:481: puṇyā ca sarvasaritāṃ bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_7.10 //
GP12skp031pu:486: tato viniḥsṛtā bhūyaḥ semaṃ lokamapāvayat // SkP_7.12 //
GP12skp031pu:495: hālāhala iti khyātas taṃ deśaṃ so 'bhyagacchata // SkP_7.16 //
GP12skp031pu:502: āyāti tvarito yūyaṃ tasmādenaṃ nihanyatha // SkP_7.19 //
GP12skp031pu:504: bhittvā śūlena saṃkruddhā vigatāsuṃ ca cakrire // SkP_7.20 //
GP12skp031pu:505: hate tasmiṃstadā devo diśaḥ sarvā avaikṣata /
GP12skp031pu:510: bhakṣayanti sma mahiṣaṃ mitvā mitvā yatastu tāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:513: mahākapālaṃ tattasmāt triṣu lokeṣu gadyate // SkP_7.24 //
GP12skp031pu:519: bhaviṣyati na saṃdehaḥ siddhakṣetraṃ mahātmanaḥ // SkP_7.27 //
GP12skp031pu:520: śmeti hi procyate pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ śānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:523: evaṃ tatra naraḥ pāpaṃ sarvameva prahāsyati /
GP12skp031pu:528: vāyuruvāca tataḥ sa tatra saṃsthāpya devasyārcādvayaṃ śubham /
GP12skp031pu:533: kaśmīraḥ so 'bhavannāmnā deśaḥ puṇyatamaḥ sadā // SkP_7.33 //
GP12skp031pu:534: tato devaḥ saha gaṇai rūpaṃ vikṛtamāsthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:543: paṭhennaro yaḥ śṛṇuyācca sarvadā tripiṣṭapaṃ gacchati so 'bhinanditaḥ //
GP12skp031pu:548: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ teṣāṃ samāpte 'tha sattre varṣasahasrike /
GP12skp031pu:550: brahmovāca bhūyo 'nyena ha sattreṇa yajadhvaṃ devamīśvaram /
GP12skp031pu:551: yadā vo bhavitā vighnaṃ tadā niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ // SkP_8.3 //
GP12skp031pu:552: vighnaṃ taccaiva saṃtīrya tapastaptvā ca bhāsvaram /
GP12skp031pu:553: yogaṃ prāpya mahadyuktās tato drakṣyatha śaṃkaram // SkP_8.4 //
GP12skp031pu:556: niḥsomāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnāmetāṃ tato dvijāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:559: svarbhānunā hṛtaḥ somas tataste duḥkhitābhavan // SkP_8.7 //
GP12skp031pu:562: ūcuścainaṃ mahābhāgā hṛtaḥ somo hi naḥ prabho /
GP12skp031pu:563: kenāpi tadbhavānkṣipram ihānayatu mā ciram // SkP_8.9 //
GP12skp031pu:565: uvāca sa tadā viprān praṇamya bhayapīḍitaḥ // SkP_8.10 //
GP12skp031pu:567: na ca taṃ vedmi kenāsau kva vā nīta iti prabhuḥ // SkP_8.11 //
GP12skp031pu:569: ūcuḥ sarve susaṃrabdhā ilāputraṃ mahāmatim // SkP_8.12 //
GP12skp031pu:571: na ca nastadbhayaṃ śakto vināśayitumāśvapi // SkP_8.13 //
GP12skp031pu:575: tapasā svena rājendra paśya no balamuttamam // SkP_8.15 //
GP12skp031pu:579: rūpiṇī darśanaṃ prādād uvācedaṃ ca tāndvijān // SkP_8.17 //
GP12skp031pu:580: tuṣṭāsmi vatsāḥ kiṃ vo 'dya karomi varadāsmi vaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:581: brūta tatkṛtameveha bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_8.18 //
GP12skp031pu:582: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ somo no 'pahṛto devi kenāpi sudurātmanā /
GP12skp031pu:583: tamānaya namaste 'stu eṣa no vara uttamaḥ // SkP_8.19 //
GP12skp031pu:584: sanatkumāra uvāca sā tathoktā viniścitya dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:588: te tamāsādya ṛṣayaḥ prāpya yajñaphalaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:591: āgatya tānṛṣīnprāha tapaḥ kuruta mā ciram // SkP_8.23 //
GP12skp031pu:592: te saha brahmaṇā gatvā mainākaṃ parvatottamam /
GP12skp031pu:596: te yuktā brahmaṇā sārdham ṛṣayaḥ saha devataiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:603: divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchāmi paśyadhvaṃ māṃ yathepsitam // SkP_8.29 //
GP12skp031pu:604: sanatkumāra uvāca apaśyanta tataḥ sarve sūryāyutasamaprabham /
GP12skp031pu:615: tamapaśyanta te sarve devā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:616: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhavenmṛtyur martyasyāpi kadācana // SkP_8.35 //
GP12skp031pu:619: prasamīkṣya mahāsureśakālaṃ manasā cāpi vicārya durvisahyam /
GP12skp031pu:623: sanatkumāra uvāca te dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ sarve sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:625: pitāmaha uvāca namaḥ śivāya somāya bhaktānāṃ bhayahāriṇe /
GP12skp031pu:636: namaḥ parvatavāsāya śirohartre ca me purā // SkP_9.7 //
GP12skp031pu:640: namo narasya kartre ca sthitikartre namaḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:641: utpattipralayānāṃ ca kartre sarvasahāya ca // SkP_9.9 //
GP12skp031pu:643: śivaḥ saumyaśca deveśa bhava no bhaktavatsala // SkP_9.10 //
GP12skp031pu:644: sanatkumāra uvāca brahmaṇyathaivaṃ stuvati devadevaḥ sa lokapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:647: varaṃ brūta pradāsyāmi suniścintya sa ucyatām // SkP_9.12 //
GP12skp031pu:650: brahmovāca yadi tuṣṭo 'si deveśa yadi deyo varaśca naḥ /
GP12skp031pu:651: tasmācchivaśca saumyaśca dṛśyaścaiva bhavasva naḥ // SkP_9.14 //
GP12skp031pu:653: sarvakāryeṣu ca sadā hitaḥ pathyaśca śaṃkaraḥ // SkP_9.15 //
GP12skp031pu:655: eṣa no dīyatāṃ deva varo varasahasrada // SkP_9.16 //
GP12skp031pu:656: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktaḥ sa bhagavān brahmaṇā devasattamaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:658: ardhena tejasaḥ svasya mukhādulkāṃ sasarja ha /
GP12skp031pu:660: sākāśaṃ dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca mahimnā vyāpya viṣṭhitā /
GP12skp031pu:661: upatasthe ca deveśaṃ dīpyamānā yathā taḍit // SkP_9.19 //
GP12skp031pu:663: brahmāṇaṃ devi varadam ārādhaya śucismite // SkP_9.20 //
GP12skp031pu:666: phalaṃ phalavatāṃ śreṣṭhā yadbravīmi tapodhanāḥ // SkP_9.21 //
GP12skp031pu:668: madbhaktāstapasā yuktā ihaiva ca nivatsyatha // SkP_9.22 //
GP12skp031pu:670: puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ sthānaṃ vai bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_9.23 //
GP12skp031pu:672: svarṇākṣīṃ cāsṛjaṃ devīṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tena tatsmṛtam // SkP_9.24 //
GP12skp031pu:674: nivatsyatha mayājñaptāḥ svarṇākṣaṃ vai tataśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:675: samantādyojanaṃ kṣetraṃ pavitraṃ tanna saṃśayaḥ // SkP_9.25 //
GP12skp031pu:680: upoṣya triguṇāṃ rātriṃ caruṃ kṛtvā nivedya ca /
GP12skp031pu:681: yatra tatra mṛtaḥ so 'pi brahmaloke nivatsyati // SkP_9.27 //
GP12skp031pu:684: niyamena mṛtaścātra mayā saha cariṣyati // SkP_9.28 //
GP12skp031pu:687: evaṃ sa tānṛṣīnuktvā dṛṣṭvā saumyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:689: sanatkumāra uvāca ya imaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo dvijātīñchrāvayeta vā /
GP12skp031pu:691: jayati jaladavāhaḥ sarvabhūtāntakālaḥ śamadamaniyatānāṃ kleśahartā yatīnām
GP12skp031pu:692: jananamaraṇahartā ceṣṭatāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ vividhakaraṇayuktaḥ khecaraḥ pādacārī // SkP_9.32 //
GP12skp031pu:697: sanatkumāra uvāca sā devī tryambakaproktā tatāpa suciraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:699: vāyvāhārā punaścāpi abbhakṣā bhūya eva ca // SkP_10.1 //
GP12skp031pu:701: uvāca brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi devi kiṃ karavāṇi te // SkP_10.2 //
GP12skp031pu:703: vicareyaṃ sukhaṃ deva sarvāṃl lokānnamastava // SkP_10.3 //
GP12skp031pu:704: brahmovāca na hi yena śarīreṇa kriyate paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:707: jāyasva duhitā bhūtvā patiṃ rudramavāpsyasi // SkP_10.5 //
GP12skp031pu:708: tataḥ sā tadvacaḥ śrutvā yogāddevī manasvinī /
GP12skp031pu:709: dakṣasya duhitā jajñe satī nāmātiyoginī // SkP_10.6 //
GP12skp031pu:716: anyāḥ sṛjasva bhadraṃ te prajā mṛtyusamanvitāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:717: tena coktaṃ sthito 'smīti sthāṇustena tataḥ smṛtaḥ // SkP_10.10 //
GP12skp031pu:718: deva uvāca na srakṣye mṛtyusaṃyuktāḥ prajā brahmankathaṃcana /
GP12skp031pu:719: sthito 'smi vacanātte 'dya vaktavyo nāsmi te punaḥ // SkP_10.11 //
GP12skp031pu:720: ye tvime mānasāḥ sṛṣṭā mahātmāno mahābalāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:721: cariṣyanti mayā sārdhaṃ sarva ete hi yājñikāḥ // SkP_10.12 //
GP12skp031pu:722: sanatkumāra uvāca atha kāle gate vyāsa sa dakṣaḥ śāpakāraṇāt /
GP12skp031pu:725: satī jñātvā tu tatsarvaṃ gatvā pitaramabravīt // SkP_10.14 //
GP12skp031pu:726: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca jāmātrā saha suvrata /
GP12skp031pu:727: māṃ hitvā nārhase hyetāḥ saha bhartṛbhirarcitum // SkP_10.15 //
GP12skp031pu:731: na tvaṃ tathā pūjayase saha bhartrā mahāvrate // SkP_10.17 //
GP12skp031pu:734: tasmādyatte karomyadya śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12skp031pu:735: pūjāṃ gṛhāṇa tāṃ putri gaccha vā yatra rocate // SkP_10.19 //
GP12skp031pu:736: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sā krodhadīptāsyā na jagrāhātikopitā /
GP12skp031pu:737: pūjāmasaṃmatāṃ hīnām idaṃ covāca taṃ śubhā // SkP_10.20 //
GP12skp031pu:739: ślāghyāṃ caivāpyaduṣṭāṃ ca śreṣṭhāṃ māṃ garhase pitaḥ // SkP_10.21 //
GP12skp031pu:741: asatkṛtāyāḥ kiṃ me 'dya jīvitenāśubhena ha // SkP_10.22 //
GP12skp031pu:742: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ manasā tryambakāya ha /
GP12skp031pu:747: tataḥ sā dhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā āgneyīṃ sahasā satī /
GP12skp031pu:748: dadāha vai svakaṃ dehaṃ svasamutthena vahninā // SkP_10.25 //
GP12skp031pu:749: tāṃ jñātvā tryambako devīṃ tathābhūtāṃ mahāyaśāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:750: uvāca dakṣaṃ saṃgamya idaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // SkP_10.26 //
GP12skp031pu:754: tvaṃ caiva mama śāpena kṣatriyo bhavitā nṛpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:756: dharmavighnaṃ ca te tatra kariṣye krūrakarmaṇaḥ // SkP_10.28 //
GP12skp031pu:757: sanatkumāra uvāca tamuvāca tadā dakṣo dūyatā hṛdayena vai /
GP12skp031pu:758: mayā yadi sutā svā vai proktā tyaktāpi vā punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:759: kiṃ tavātra kṛtaṃ deva ahaṃ tasyāḥ prabhuḥ sadā // SkP_10.29 //
GP12skp031pu:761: bhūrloke vatsyase nityaṃ na svarloke kadācana // SkP_10.30 //
GP12skp031pu:762: bhāgaṃ ca tava yajñeṣu dattvā sarve dvijātayaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:763: apaḥ sprakṣyanti sarvatra mahādeva mahādyute // SkP_10.31 //
GP12skp031pu:764: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa devaḥ prahasaṃs tamuvāca trilocanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:765: sarveṣāmeva lokānāṃ mūlaṃ bhūrloka ucyate // SkP_10.32 //
GP12skp031pu:767: bhūrloke hi dhṛte lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:768: tasmāttiṣṭhāmyahaṃ nityam ihaiva na tavājñayā // SkP_10.33 //
GP12skp031pu:770: apaḥ spṛśanti śuddhyarthaṃ bhāgaṃ yacchanti me tataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:773: aśuciṃ spraṣṭukāmāśca tyaktvāpaḥ saṃspṛśanti ca // SkP_10.35 //
GP12skp031pu:775: bhāgānapaḥ spṛśanti sma tatra kā paridevanā // SkP_10.36 //
GP12skp031pu:778: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ sa bhagavāñchaptvā dakṣaṃ devo jagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:779: virarāma mahātejā jagāma ca yathāgatam // SkP_10.38 //
GP12skp031pu:787: sanatkumāra uvāca kadācitsvagṛhaṃ prāptaṃ kaśyapaṃ dvipadāṃ varam /
GP12skp031pu:788: apṛcchaddhimavānpraśnaṃ loke khyātikaraṃ nu kim // SkP_11.1 //
GP12skp031pu:789: kenākṣayāśca lokāḥ syuḥ khyātiśca paramā mune /
GP12skp031pu:790: tathaiva cārcanīyatvaṃ satsu taṃ kathayasva me // SkP_11.2 //
GP12skp031pu:792: mama khyātirapatyena brahmaṇo ṛṣibhiśca ha // SkP_11.3 //
GP12skp031pu:793: kiṃ na paśyasi śailendra yato māṃ paripṛcchasi /
GP12skp031pu:794: vartayiṣyāmi taccāpi yanme dṛṣṭaṃ purācala // SkP_11.4 //
GP12skp031pu:798: tānahaṃ tapasā jñātvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ sthitaḥ // SkP_11.6 //
GP12skp031pu:802: viveśa taṃ tadā deśaṃ sā gartā yatra bhūdhara // SkP_11.8 //
GP12skp031pu:804: apaśyadārto duḥkhārtān apṛcchattāṃśca sa dvijaḥ // SkP_11.9 //
GP12skp031pu:806: duḥkhitāḥ kena mokṣaśca yuṣmākaṃ bhavitānaghāḥ // SkP_11.10 //
GP12skp031pu:807: pitara ūcuḥ vayaṃ te 'kṛtapuṇyasya pitaraḥ sapitāmahāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:808: prapitāmahāśca kliśyāmas tava duṣṭena karmaṇā // SkP_11.11 //
GP12skp031pu:810: tvaṃ cāpi vīraṇastambas tvayi lambāmahe vayam // SkP_11.12 //
GP12skp031pu:811: yāvattvaṃ jīvase vipra tāvadeva vayaṃ sthitāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:812: mṛte tvayi gamiṣyāmo narakaṃ pāpacetasaḥ // SkP_11.13 //
GP12skp031pu:815: nānyena tapasā putra na tīrthānāṃ phalena ca /
GP12skp031pu:817: sa tatheti pratijñāya ārādhya ca vṛṣadhvajam /
GP12skp031pu:819: svayaṃ ca rudradayitaḥ sukeśo nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:823: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamukto ṛṣiṇā śailendro niyame sthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:824: tapaścakāra vipulaṃ yena brahmā tutoṣa ha // SkP_11.19 //
GP12skp031pu:826: brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi te śaila tapasānena suvrata // SkP_11.20 //
GP12skp031pu:828: etadvaraṃ prayacchasva yadi tuṣṭo 'si naḥ prabho // SkP_11.21 //
GP12skp031pu:829: brahmovāca kanyā bhavitrī śailendra sutā te varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:833: jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te anye cānu tataḥ śubhe // SkP_11.23 //
GP12skp031pu:834: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā tato brahmā tatraivāntaradhīyata /
GP12skp031pu:838: āśrite dve aparṇā tu aniketā tapo 'carat /
GP12skp031pu:842: pūrṇe pūrṇe sahasre tu āhāraṃ tena cakratuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:843: aparṇā tu nirāhārā tāṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata /
GP12skp031pu:844: niṣedhayantī hyu meti mātṛsnehena duḥkhitā // SkP_11.27 //
GP12skp031pu:845: sā tathoktā tadā mātrā devī duścaracāriṇī /
GP12skp031pu:846: tenaiva nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātā surapūjitā // SkP_11.28 //
GP12skp031pu:852: anugṛhṇanti lokāṃśca tapasā svena sarvadā // SkP_11.31 //
GP12skp031pu:853: umā tāsāṃ variṣṭhā ca śreṣṭhā ca varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:856: asitasyaikaparṇā tu devalaṃ suṣuve sutam // SkP_11.33 //
GP12skp031pu:857: yā tu tāsāṃ kumārīṇāṃ tṛtīyā hyekapāṭalā /
GP12skp031pu:860: umā tu yā mayā tubhyaṃ kīrtitā varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:863: brahmovāca devi kiṃ tapasā lokāṃs tāpayasyatiśobhane /
GP12skp031pu:864: tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ viśvaṃ mā kṛtvā tadvināśaya // SkP_11.36 //
GP12skp031pu:866: brūhi kiṃ te jaganmātaḥ prārthitaṃ samprasīda naḥ // SkP_11.37 //
GP12skp031pu:867: devyuvāca yadarthaṃ tapaso hyasya caraṇaṃ me pitāmaha /
GP12skp031pu:868: jānīṣe tattvametanme tataḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ punaḥ // SkP_11.38 //
GP12skp031pu:869: brahmovāca yadarthaṃ devi tapasā śrāmyase lokabhāvani /
GP12skp031pu:870: sa tvāṃ svayaṃ samāgamya ihaiva varayiṣyati // SkP_11.39 //
GP12skp031pu:872: vayaṃ sadevā yasyeśe vaśyāḥ kiṃkaravādinaḥ // SkP_11.40 //
GP12skp031pu:873: sa devadevaḥ parameśvareśvaraḥ svayaṃ tavāyāsyati lokapo 'ntikam /
GP12skp031pu:874: udārarūpo vikṛtābhirūpavān samānarūpo na hi yasya kasyacit // SkP_11.41 //
GP12skp031pu:879: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo brahmā tāmāha susvaram /
GP12skp031pu:880: devi yenaiva sṛṣṭāsi manasā yastvayā vṛtaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:881: sa bhartā tava deveśo bhavitā mā tapaḥ kṛthāḥ // SkP_12.1 //
GP12skp031pu:882: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā brahmā vyāsa gireḥ sutām /
GP12skp031pu:883: jagāmādarśanaṃ tasyāḥ sā cāpi virarāma ha // SkP_12.2 //
GP12skp031pu:884: sā devī yuktamityevam uktvā svasyāśramasya ha /
GP12skp031pu:885: dvāri jātamaśokaṃ vai samupāśritya saṃsthitā // SkP_12.3 //
GP12skp031pu:887: vikṛtaṃ rūpamāsthāya hrasvo bāhuka eva ca // SkP_12.4 //
GP12skp031pu:889: uvāca vikṛtāsyaśca devi tvāṃ varayāmyaham // SkP_12.5 //
GP12skp031pu:895: tau prabhū mama dāne vai kanyāhaṃ dvijapuṃgava // SkP_12.8 //
GP12skp031pu:897: sa ceddadāti māṃ vipra tubhyaṃ tadrucitaṃ mama // SkP_12.9 //
GP12skp031pu:898: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa bhagavāndevas tathaiva vikṛtaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:899: uvāca śailarājaṃ tam umāṃ me yaccha śailarāṭ // SkP_12.10 //
GP12skp031pu:901: bhītaḥ śāpācca vimanā idaṃ vacanamabravīt // SkP_12.11 //
GP12skp031pu:903: manīṣitaṃ tu yatpūrvaṃ tacchṛṇuṣva mahātapaḥ // SkP_12.12 //
GP12skp031pu:905: varayedyaṃ svayaṃ tatra sa bhartāsyā bhavediti // SkP_12.13 //
GP12skp031pu:908: devi pitrā tavājñaptaḥ svayaṃvara iti śrutam /
GP12skp031pu:909: tatra tvaṃ varayitrī yaṃ sa te bhartā kilānaghe // SkP_12.15 //
GP12skp031pu:911: rūpavantaṃ samutsṛjya vṛṇīthā mādṛśaṃ katham // SkP_12.16 //
GP12skp031pu:912: sanatkumāra uvāca tenoktā sā tadā tatra bhāvayantī tadīritam /
GP12skp031pu:913: bhāvaṃ ca rudranihitaṃ prasādaṃ manasastathā // SkP_12.17 //
GP12skp031pu:915: ahaṃ tvāṃ varayiṣyāmi nānyadbhūtaṃ kathaṃcana // SkP_12.18 //
GP12skp031pu:916: atha vā te 'sti saṃdeho mayi vipra kathaṃcana /
GP12skp031pu:917: ihaiva tvāṃ mahābhāga varayāmi manoratham // SkP_12.19 //
GP12skp031pu:918: sanatkumāra uvāca gṛhītvā stabakaṃ sā tu hastābhyāṃ tatra saṃsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:919: skandhe śambhoḥ samādāya devī prāha vṛto 'si me // SkP_12.20 //
GP12skp031pu:920: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevas tathā devyā vṛtastadā /
GP12skp031pu:921: uvāca tamaśokaṃ vai vācā saṃjīvayanniva // SkP_12.21 //
GP12skp031pu:923: tasmāttvaṃ jarayā tyaktaḥ amaraḥ sambhaviṣyasi // SkP_12.22 //
GP12skp031pu:931: yatra tatra mṛtaścāpi brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati // SkP_12.25 //
GP12skp031pu:934: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā tadā deva āpṛcchya himavatsutām /
GP12skp031pu:937: tata evonmukhī sthitvā śilāyāṃ saṃviveśa ha // SkP_12.28 //
GP12skp031pu:938: unmukhī sā gate tasmin maheṣvāse prajāpatau /
GP12skp031pu:939: niśeva candrarahitā sā babhau vimanāstadā // SkP_12.29 //
GP12skp031pu:940: atha śuśrāva sā śabdaṃ bālasyārtasya śailajā /
GP12skp031pu:942: sa kṛtvā bālarūpaṃ tu devadevaḥ svayaṃ śivaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:946: trātu māṃ kaścidetyeha grāheṇa hṛtacetasam // SkP_12.32 //
GP12skp031pu:948: yāsyāmi nidhanaṃ vaktre grāhasyāsya durātmanaḥ // SkP_12.33 //
GP12skp031pu:949: śocāmi na svakaṃ dehaṃ grāhagrasto 'pi duḥkhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:950: yathā śocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca tapasvinīm // SkP_12.34 //
GP12skp031pu:953: sanatkumāra uvāca śrutvā tu devī taṃ nādaṃ viprasyārtasya śobhanā /
GP12skp031pu:954: utthāya pradrutā tatra yatra tiṣṭhatyasau dvijaḥ // SkP_12.36 //
GP12skp031pu:958: taṃ gṛhītvā drutaṃ yāto madhyaṃ sarasa eva ha // SkP_12.38 //
GP12skp031pu:960: athāha devī duḥkhārtā bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvratā // SkP_12.39 //
GP12skp031pu:963: grāha uvāca yo devi divase ṣaṣṭhe prathamaṃ samupaiti mām /
GP12skp031pu:964: sa āhāro mama purā vihito lokakartṛbhiḥ // SkP_12.41 //
GP12skp031pu:966: brahmaṇā vihito nūnaṃ nainaṃ mokṣye kathaṃcana // SkP_12.42 //
GP12skp031pu:967: devyuvāca yanmayā himavacchṛṅge caritaṃ tapa uttamam /
GP12skp031pu:968: tena bālamimaṃ muñca grāharāja namo 'stu te // SkP_12.43 //
GP12skp031pu:969: grāha uvāca mā vyayaṃ tapaso devi kārṣīḥ śailendranandane /
GP12skp031pu:970: nainaṃ mocayituṃ śakto devarājo 'pi sa svayam // SkP_12.44 //
GP12skp031pu:974: dattaṃ tato bravīmi tvāṃ nāyaṃ mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.46 //
GP12skp031pu:975: atha vā te kṛpā devi bhṛśaṃ bāle śubhānane /
GP12skp031pu:976: bravīmi yatkuru tathā tato mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.47 //
GP12skp031pu:978: tatkṛtaṃ nātra saṃdeho mānyā me brāhmaṇā dṛḍham // SkP_12.48 //
GP12skp031pu:979: grāha uvāca yatkṛtaṃ vai tapaḥ kiṃcid bhavatyā svalpamantaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:980: tatsarvaṃ me prayacchasva tato mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.49 //
GP12skp031pu:981: devyuvāca janmaprabhṛti yatpuṇyaṃ mahāgrāha kṛtaṃ mayā /
GP12skp031pu:982: tatte sarvaṃ mayā dattaṃ bālaṃ muñca mamāgrataḥ // SkP_12.50 //
GP12skp031pu:983: sanatkumāra uvāca prajajvāla tato grāhas tapasā tena bṛṃhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:985: uvāca cedaṃ tuṣṭātmā devīṃ lokasya dhāriṇīm /
GP12skp031pu:987: tapaso hyarjanaṃ duḥkhaṃ tasya tyāgo na śasyate // SkP_12.52 //
GP12skp031pu:988: gṛhāṇa tapa etacca bālaṃ cemaṃ śucismite /
GP12skp031pu:989: tuṣṭo 'smi te viprabhaktyā varaṃ tasmāddadāmi te // SkP_12.53 //
GP12skp031pu:992: na viprebhyastapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhā me brāhmaṇā matāḥ // SkP_12.54 //
GP12skp031pu:993: dattvā cāhaṃ na gṛhṇāmi grāhendra viditaṃ hi te /
GP12skp031pu:994: na hi kaścinnaro grāha pradattaṃ punarāharet // SkP_12.55 //
GP12skp031pu:997: tathoktastāṃ praśasyātha muktvā bālaṃ namasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:999: bālo 'pi sarasastīre mukto grāheṇa vai tadā /
GP12skp031pu:1002: bhūya eva tapaḥ kartum ārebhe yatnamāsthitā // SkP_12.59 //
GP12skp031pu:1003: kartukāmāṃ tapo bhūyo jñātvā tāṃ śaṃkaraḥ svayam /
GP12skp031pu:1004: provāca vacanaṃ vyāsa mā kṛthāstapa ityuta // SkP_12.60 //
GP12skp031pu:1009: idaṃ paṭhedyo hi naraḥ sadaiva bālānubhāvācaraṇaṃ hi śambhoḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1010: sa dehabhedaṃ samavāpya pūto bhavedgaṇastasya kumāratulyaḥ // SkP_12.63 //
GP12skp031pu:1014: abhavatsa tu kālena śailaputryāḥ svayaṃvaraḥ // SkP_13.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1020: vṛṇuyātparameśānaṃ samakṣaṃ yena me sutā // SkP_13.4 //
GP12skp031pu:1022: iti saṃcintya śailendraḥ kṛtvā hṛdi maheśvaram // SkP_13.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1029: akṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ surarāṭ sa bibhrad divyāṅgahārasragudāttarūpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1031: āruhya sarvāmararāṭ sa vajraṃ bibhratsamāgātpurataḥ surāṇām // SkP_13.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1033: haimaṃ vimānaṃ sacalatpatākam āruhya āgāttvaritaṃ javena // SkP_13.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1037: daṇḍaṃ samādāya kṛtānta āgād āruhya bhīmaṃ mahiṣaṃ javena // SkP_13.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1044: āpyāyayansarvasurāsureśān kāntyā ca veṣeṇa ca cārurūpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1047: tārkṣyaṃ samāruhya mahīdhrakalpaṃ gadādharo 'sau tvaritaṃ sametaḥ //
GP12skp031pu:1048: tathāśvinau devabhiṣagvarau tu ekaṃ vimānaṃ tvarayābhiruhya /
GP12skp031pu:1051: sārdhaṃ sa nāgairaparairmahātmā vimānamāruhya samabhyagācca // SkP_13.19
GP12skp031pu:1053: varānurūpaṃ pravidhāya veṣaṃ vṛndaṃ samāgātpurataḥ surāṇām // SkP_13.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1054: gandharvarājaḥ sa ca cārurūpī divyaṅgamo divyavimānacārī /
GP12skp031pu:1060: hetustrilokasya jagatprasūter mātā ca teṣāṃ sasurāsurāṇām /
GP12skp031pu:1061: patnī ca śambhoḥ puruṣasya dhāmno gītā purāṇe prakṛtiḥ parārthā /
GP12skp031pu:1063: evaṃ yatastāṃ na viduḥ sureśā mohastatastānpara āviveśa /
GP12skp031pu:1064: varārthamājagmurato vimūḍhā īśena yasmādvṛḍitāḥ kṛtāste // SkP_13.25 //
GP12skp031pu:1068: sarvartupuṣpāṃ susugandhamālāṃ pragṛhya devī prasabhaṃ pratasthe //
GP12skp031pu:1069: sanatkumāra uvāca mālāṃ pragṛhya devyāṃ tu sthitāyāṃ devasaṃsadi /
GP12skp031pu:1071: devyā jijñāsayā śambhur bhūtvā pañcaśikhaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1073: akasmādatha taṃ devī śiśuṃ pañcaśikhaṃ sthitam /
GP12skp031pu:1076: nirvṛteva tadā tasthau kṛtvā hṛdi tameva tu // SkP_13.31 //
GP12skp031pu:1077: tato dṛṣṭvā śiśuṃ devā devyā utsaṅgavartinam /
GP12skp031pu:1082: vajraṃ kṣeptuṃ na śaśāka bāhuṃ cālayituṃ na ca // SkP_13.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1083: bhago nāma tato deva ādityaḥ kāśyapo balī /
GP12skp031pu:1087: tasyāpi śiraso devaḥ khālityaṃ pracakāra ha // SkP_13.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1089: tasyāpi daśanāḥ petur dṛṣṭamātrasya śambhunā // SkP_13.37 //
GP12skp031pu:1090: yamasya stambhito daṇḍas tejo vahneḥ śaśeḥ prabhā /
GP12skp031pu:1092: balaṃ tejaśca yogaṃ ca tathaivāstambhayadvibhuḥ // SkP_13.38 //
GP12skp031pu:1093: atha teṣu sthiteṣvevaṃ manyumatsu sureṣu tu /
GP12skp031pu:1099: ajastvamamaro deva sraṣṭā hartā vibhuḥ paraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1101: amṛtaṃ paramātmā ca īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:1103: iyaṃ ca prakṛtirdevī sadā te sṛṣṭikāraṇam /
GP12skp031pu:1106: prasādāttava deveśa niyogācca mayā prajāḥ // SkP_13.44 //
GP12skp031pu:1109: tata evaṃ tadā brahmā vijñāpya parameśvaram /
GP12skp031pu:1111: mūḍhāḥ stha devatāḥ sarve nainaṃ budhyata śaṃkaram /
GP12skp031pu:1113: ayaṃ rudro mahādevaḥ śarvo bhīmaḥ kapardimān /
GP12skp031pu:1114: ugra īśāna ātmā ca ajaḥ śaṃkara eva ca // SkP_13.48 //
GP12skp031pu:1115: devadevaḥ paraṃ dhāma īśaḥ paśupatiḥ patiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1129: brahmādyā nemire tūrṇaṃ sarva eva sureśvarāḥ // SkP_13.55 //
GP12skp031pu:1130: tasya devī tadā hṛṣṭā samakṣaṃ tridivaukasām /
GP12skp031pu:1136: ślāghyaḥ pūjyaśca vandyaśca sarveṣāṃ nastvamadya hi /
GP12skp031pu:1137: śarveṇa saha sambandho yasya te 'bhūdayaṃ mahān /
GP12skp031pu:1138: kriyatāṃ cāśu udvāhaḥ kimarthaṃ sthīyate param // SkP_13.59 //
GP12skp031pu:1139: tataḥ praṇamya himavāṃs taṃ devaṃ pratyabhāṣata /
GP12skp031pu:1140: tvameva kāraṇaṃ deva yena śarvādayaṃ mama // SkP_13.60 //
GP12skp031pu:1142: udvāhaṃ tu yathā yādṛk tadvidhatsva pitāmaha // SkP_13.61 //
GP12skp031pu:1143: tata evaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā girirājñaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1144: udvāhaḥ kriyatāṃ deva iti devamuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:1145: tamāha śaṃkaro devaṃ yatheṣṭamiti lokapaḥ // SkP_13.62 //
GP12skp031pu:1146: tatkṣaṇācca tato vyāsa brahmaṇā kalpitaṃ puram /
GP12skp031pu:1156: pravavau sukhasaṃsparśa īśe bhaktiṃ prasādayan // SkP_13.67 //
GP12skp031pu:1158: devanadyo mahānadyaḥ siddhā munaya eva ca // SkP_13.68 //
GP12skp031pu:1161: tumbururnārado hāhā hūhū caiva tu sāmagāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1166: gāyanti hṛṣitāḥ sarvā udvāhe parameṣṭhinaḥ // SkP_13.72 //
GP12skp031pu:1204: nānāpuṣparajaḥsugandhipavanaprahlādanī cetasāṃ tatrāgātkalahaṃsanūpuraravā devyā vivāhe śarat atyarthaśītalāmbhobhiḥ plāvayantau gireḥ śilāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1209: agādhena tadā reje kṣīroda iva sāgaraḥ // SkP_13.94 //
GP12skp031pu:1217: prāleyadhārāḥ śaśipādagaurā gokṣīradhārā iva saṃnipetuḥ // SkP_13.98 //
GP12skp031pu:1225: manobhavodrekakarāḥ surāṇāṃ surāṅganānāṃ ca muhuḥ samīrāḥ // SkP_13.102 //
GP12skp031pu:1227: īṣatsamudbhinnapayodharāgrā nāryo yathā ramyatamā babhūvuḥ // SkP_13.103
GP12skp031pu:1228: ṛtoḥ svabhāvācca madodbhavācca phullāsu śākhāsu nilīnapakṣāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1235: śuśubhuḥ kāryamuddiśya vṛddhā iva samāgatāḥ // SkP_13.107 //
GP12skp031pu:1239: parasparaṃ hi mālatyo bhāṣantya iva rejire // SkP_13.109 //
GP12skp031pu:1240: nīlāni nīlāmburuhaiḥ payāṃsi gaurāṇi gauraiśca sanāladaṇḍaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1242: haimāni vistīrṇajaleṣu keṣucin nirantaraṃ mārakatāni keṣucit /
GP12skp031pu:1243: vaidūryanālāni saraḥsu keṣucit prajajñire padmavanāni sarvataḥ //
GP12skp031pu:1246: śṛṅgāṇi tasya tu gireḥ karṇikāraiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1251: girau vavṛdhire phullāḥ spardhayeva parasparam // SkP_13.115 //
GP12skp031pu:1258: śrutvā śabdaṃ ṛtumadakalaṃ sarvataḥ kokilānāṃ cañcatpakṣāḥ sumadhurarutaṃ nīlakaṇṭhā vineduḥ
GP12skp031pu:1259: teṣāṃ śabdairupacitabalaḥ puṣpacāpeṣuhastaḥ sajjībhūtastridaśavanitā veddhumaṅgeṣvanaṅgaḥ paṭusūryātapaścāpi prāyaḥ soṣṇajalāśayaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1274: nānāvādyaśatākīrṇe brahmā mama pitā svayam // SkP_13.127 //
GP12skp031pu:1279: dadāsi mahyaṃ yadyājñāṃ kartavyo 'yaṃ kriyāvidhiḥ // SkP_13.129 //
GP12skp031pu:1282: kartāsmi vacanaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaṃstava jagadvibho // SkP_13.130 //
GP12skp031pu:1284: hastaṃ devasya devyāśca yogabandhe yuyoja ha // SkP_13.131 //
GP12skp031pu:1288: triśca taṃ jvalanaṃ devaṃ kārayitvā pradakṣiṇam // SkP_13.133 //
GP12skp031pu:1291: vṛtte udvāhakāle tu praṇanāma vṛṣadhvajam // SkP_13.134 //
GP12skp031pu:1293: udvāhaḥ sa paro vṛtto yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit // SkP_13.135 //
GP12skp031pu:1298: sanatkumāra uvāca atha vṛtte vivāhe tu bhavasyāmitatejasaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1308: namo vedarahasyāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // SkP_14.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1328: namo muṇḍārdhamuṇḍāya paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ // SkP_14.15 //
GP12skp031pu:1332: namo rudrāya vasave ādityāyāśvine namaḥ // SkP_14.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1333: namaḥ pitre 'tha sādhyāya viśvedevāya vai namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1334: namaḥ śarvāya sarvāya ugrāya varadāya ca // SkP_14.18 //
GP12skp031pu:1335: namo bhīmāya senānye paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1336: śucaye rerihāṇāya sadyojātāya vai namaḥ // SkP_14.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1338: pradhānāya prameyāya kāryāya karaṇāya ca // SkP_14.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1344: namo vaiṣamyakartre ca guṇānāṃ vṛttidāya ca // SkP_14.23 //
GP12skp031pu:1346: śivaḥ saumyaḥ sukho draṣṭuṃ bhava somo hi naḥ prabho // SkP_14.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1347: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ sa bhagavāndevo jagatpatirumāpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1349: draṣṭuṃ sukhaśca saumyaśca devānāmasmi bho surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1350: varaṃ brūta yatheṣṭaṃ ca dātāsmi vadatānaghāḥ // SkP_14.26 //
GP12skp031pu:1351: tataste praṇatāḥ sarve ūcuḥ sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1353: yadā kāryaṃ tadā nastvaṃ dāsyase varamīpsitam // SkP_14.27 //
GP12skp031pu:1355: lokāṃśca pramathaiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa bhavanaṃ tataḥ // SkP_14.28 //
GP12skp031pu:1358: sanatkumāra uvāca pārāśarya stavaṃ hīdaṃ śṛṇuyādyaḥ paṭheta vā /
GP12skp031pu:1362: sanatkumāra uvāca praviṣṭe bhavanaṃ deve sūpaviṣṭe varāsane /
GP12skp031pu:1363: sa bahirmanmathaḥ krūro devaṃ veddhumanābhavat // SkP_15.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1367: cakrāhvayasya rūpeṇa ratyā saha tamāgatam // SkP_15.3 //
GP12skp031pu:1373: prasādayaṃśca taṃ devaṃ papāta sa mahītale // SkP_15.6 //
GP12skp031pu:1376: patnī tu karuṇaṃ tasya vilalāpa suduḥkhitā /
GP12skp031pu:1377: devaṃ devīṃ ca duḥkhārtā ayācatkaruṇāyatī // SkP_15.8 //
GP12skp031pu:1378: tasyāśca karuṇāṃ śrutvā devau tau karuṇātmakau /
GP12skp031pu:1379: ūcatustāṃ samālokya samāśvāsya ca duḥkhitām // SkP_15.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1381: aśarīro 'pi te kāle kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati // SkP_15.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1383: tadā tasya suto 'yaṃ syāt patiste sa bhaviṣyati // SkP_15.11 //
GP12skp031pu:1384: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sā taṃ varaṃ labdhvā kāmapatnī śubhānanā /
GP12skp031pu:1385: jagāmeṣṭaṃ tadā deśaṃ prītiyuktā gataklamā // SkP_15.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1386: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ dagdhvā sa kāmaṃ tu śaṃkaro mūḍhacetasam /
GP12skp031pu:1387: provāca himavatputrīṃ bhaktyā munivarasya ha // SkP_15.13 //
GP12skp031pu:1388: vasiṣṭho nāma viprendro māṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyate /
GP12skp031pu:1390: evamuktvā sa devīṃ tu bhaktiprītyā tadā vibhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1395: uvāca bhagavāngatvā brūhi kiṃ te dadāni te /
GP12skp031pu:1396: dadāmi divyaṃ cakṣuste paśya māṃ sagaṇaṃ dvija // SkP_15.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1397: dṛṣṭvā sa tu tamīśānaṃ praṇamya śirasā prabhum /
GP12skp031pu:1399: vasiṣṭha uvāca namaḥ kanakaliṅgāya vedaliṅgāya vai namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1400: namaḥ sahasraliṅgāya vahniliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1402: namaḥ pavanaliṅgāya brahmaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1404: namaḥ parvataliṅgāya sthitiliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.21 //
GP12skp031pu:1410: namaḥ puruṣaliṅgāya bhāvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1412: namo rajordhvaliṅgāya sattvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.25 //
GP12skp031pu:1414: namo vāyūrdhvaliṅgāya śabdaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.26 //
GP12skp031pu:1419: diśa naḥ paramaṃ yogam apatyaṃ matsamaṃ tathā /
GP12skp031pu:1420: brahma caivākṣayaṃ deva śamaṃ caiva paraṃ vibho /
GP12skp031pu:1421: akṣayatvaṃ ca vaṃśasya dharme ca matimakṣayām // SkP_15.29 //
GP12skp031pu:1422: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ sa bhagavānvyāsa vasiṣṭhenāmitātmanā /
GP12skp031pu:1424: bhagavānuvāca tuṣṭaste 'haṃ dadānyetat tava sarvaṃ manogatam /
GP12skp031pu:1425: yogaṃ ca paramaṃ sūkṣmam akṣayaṃ sarvakāmikam // SkP_15.31 //
GP12skp031pu:1427: dadāni te ṛṣiśreṣṭha pratibhāsyanti caiva te // SkP_15.32 //
GP12skp031pu:1428: damaḥ śamastathā kīrtis tuṣṭirakrodha eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:1429: nityaṃ tava bhaviṣyanti amaratvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // SkP_15.33 //
GP12skp031pu:1432: brūhi cānyānapi varān dadāmi ṛṣisattama // SkP_15.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1433: vasiṣṭha uvāca bhagavanviditaṃ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ devasattama /
GP12skp031pu:1434: na syāddhi tattathā deva yathā vā manyase prabho // SkP_15.35 //
GP12skp031pu:1435: deva uvāca bhaviṣyaṃ nānyathā kuryād iti me niścitā matiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1436: ahaṃ kartā bhaviṣyasya kathaṃ kuryāttadanyathā // SkP_15.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1437: tathā tannātra saṃdeho vihitaṃ yadyathā mayā /
GP12skp031pu:1439: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā tato devaḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1443: vyāsa uvāca varānsa labdhvā bhagavān vasiṣṭho 'smatpitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1444: kaṃ putraṃ janayāmāsa ātmanaḥ sadṛśadyutim // SkP_16.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1445: sanatkumāra uvāca tenāsau varadānena devadevasya śūlinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1453: kena stoṣyāmi te deva yastvaṃ sarvajagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1455: tvameva bhoktā bhojyaṃ ca kartā kāryaṃ tathā kriyā /
GP12skp031pu:1458: icchāmi dattaṃ deveśa eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ // SkP_16.7 //
GP12skp031pu:1459: sanatkumāra uvāca tamevaṃvādinaṃ devaḥ prahasya vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1460: uvāca vacasā vyāsa diśaḥ sarvā vinādayan // SkP_16.8 //
GP12skp031pu:1461: tvayāhaṃ yācitaḥ śakte sa ca te saṃbhaviṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:1464: bījātmanā na bhavati pariṇāmāntaraṃ gataḥ // SkP_16.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1466: svenātmanā na bhavitā pariṇāmāntaraṃ gataḥ // SkP_16.11 //
GP12skp031pu:1467: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā tu taṃ devaḥ prahasya ca nirīkṣya ca /
GP12skp031pu:1478: vyāsa uvāca kasmātsa rājā tamṛṣiṃ cakhāda tapasānvitam /
GP12skp031pu:1479: rakṣasā sa kimarthaṃ ca hṛtacetābhavannṛpaḥ // SkP_17.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1480: sanatkumāra uvāca vasiṣṭhayājyo rājāsīn nāmnā mitrasahaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1483: tatra me niśi rājendra sadaiva piśitāśanam // SkP_17.3 //
GP12skp031pu:1491: saudāsa uvāca mayāmṛtavaso prātar guruputrasya dhīmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1493: tatkuruṣva tathā kṣipraṃ kālo no nātyagādyathā // SkP_17.7 //
GP12skp031pu:1499: rājovāca jāne sarvopayogaṃ ca jāne cāduṣṭatāṃ tava /
GP12skp031pu:1500: jāne stokaṃ ca piśitaṃ kāryaṃ cedaṃ tathāvidham /
GP12skp031pu:1501: mṛgyatāṃ piśitaṃ kṣipraṃ labdhavyaṃ yatra manyase // SkP_17.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1505: gatvā niśi mahārājam idaṃ vacanamarthavat // SkP_17.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1507: mṛgayanparikhinno 'smi śādhi kiṃ karavāṇi te // SkP_17.13 //
GP12skp031pu:1508: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamuktaḥ sūdena tasminkāle narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1509: novāca kiṃcittaṃ sūdaṃ tūṣṇīmeva babhūva ha // SkP_17.14 //
GP12skp031pu:1511: rākṣaso rudhiro nāma saṃviveśa narādhipam // SkP_17.15 //
GP12skp031pu:1513: uvāca sūdaṃ śanakaiḥ karṇamūle mahādyutiḥ // SkP_17.16 //
GP12skp031pu:1515: gārdabhaṃ vāpyathauṣṭraṃ vā sarvaṃ saṃskartumarhasi // SkP_17.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1516: kimasau jñāsyate rātrau tvayā bhūyaśca saṃskṛtam /
GP12skp031pu:1518: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamuktastenātha mānuṣaṃ māṃsamādade /
GP12skp031pu:1527: na dīyate vidhijñena tvaṃ tu māmavamanyase // SkP_17.23 //
GP12skp031pu:1529: tasmāttvaṃ karmaṇā tena puruṣādo bhaviṣyasi // SkP_17.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1530: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktastu tejasvī rājā saṃcintya tattadā /
GP12skp031pu:1533: tatastvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ dvija // SkP_17.26 //
GP12skp031pu:1536: pitrā tavābhyanujñātaḥ svarge vatsye yathepsitam // SkP_17.27 //
GP12skp031pu:1539: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa rājā svaṃ rājyam utsṛjya saha bhāryayā /
GP12skp031pu:1540: vanaṃ viveśa tatrābhūt puruṣādo mahābalaḥ // SkP_18.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1542: tato bhrātṛśataṃ tasya vasiṣṭhasyaiva paśyataḥ // SkP_18.2 //
GP12skp031pu:1543: tataḥ putravadhaṃ ghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmasutaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1544: notsasarja tadā krodhaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ kauśikaṃ prati /
GP12skp031pu:1546: sa baddhvā mahatīṃ kaṇṭhe śilāṃ brahmasutaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1548: śatadrūriti tāṃ prāhur munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // SkP_18.4 //
GP12skp031pu:1550: tasyāṃ vipāśaḥ saṃvṛtto vipāśā sābhavattataḥ // SkP_18.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1552: vāyubhakṣastadā tasthau svaṃ dehaṃ paritāpayan // SkP_18.6 //
GP12skp031pu:1557: tāmuvāca kutastvaṃ vai kasyaiṣa śrūyate dhvaniḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1558: sovāca dīnayā vācā rudatī śvaśuraṃ tadā // SkP_18.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1561: adhīyānasya caivāyaṃ dhvaniḥ putrasya te vibho /
GP12skp031pu:1562: udarasthasya te sūnor mā duḥkhe tvaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ // SkP_18.11 //
GP12skp031pu:1563: sanatkumāra uvāca idānīmasti me vatse jīvitāśeti so 'bravīt /
GP12skp031pu:1564: kṣāntiṃ dhṛtiṃ ca saṃsthitya prayayāvāśramaṃ muniḥ // SkP_18.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1568: tato 'sya nirgataḥ kāyād rakṣaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ // SkP_18.14 //
GP12skp031pu:1569: uvāca cainaṃ duṣṭātman daheyaṃ tvāṃ sabāndhavam /
GP12skp031pu:1570: dagdhena ca tvayā kiṃ me gaccha mukto 'si durmate // SkP_18.15 //
GP12skp031pu:1571: tataḥ sa mukto dīnātmā rākṣasaḥ krūrakarmakṛt /
GP12skp031pu:1572: praṇamya śirasā bhīto jagāma kuśikāntikam // SkP_18.16 //
GP12skp031pu:1573: gate niśācare rājā praṇamya śirasā munim /
GP12skp031pu:1576: kṛtāntena hatāḥ putrā nimittaṃ tatra rākṣasaḥ // SkP_18.18 //
GP12skp031pu:1578: brūhi kiṃ vā priyaṃ te 'dya karomi narapuṃgava // SkP_18.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1580: devyāmasyāṃ mahāsattvaṃ tatkuruṣva mama priyam // SkP_18.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1581: sanatkumāra uvāca evamastvityathoktvāsau tasyāṃ patnyāṃ mahāvrataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1582: putraṃ ca śoṇakaṃ nāma janayāmāsa nirvṛtaḥ // SkP_18.21 //
GP12skp031pu:1583: taṃ śoṇakaṃ tato rājye svaṃ putramabhiṣicya saḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1586: adṛśyantyāṃ samabhavat putro nāmnā parāśaraḥ // SkP_18.23 //
GP12skp031pu:1588: tāta tāteti ca muhur vyājahāra piturgurum // SkP_18.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1590: pitaraṃ tapasā mantrair īje rakṣaḥkratau tadā // SkP_18.25 //
GP12skp031pu:1591: tatra koṭīḥ sa pañcāśad rakṣasāṃ krūrakarmaṇām /
GP12skp031pu:1597: parāśara uvāca saha devairahaṃ sarvāṃl lokāndhakṣyāmi pāvakaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1599: sanatkumāra uvāca tasyaivaṃ garvitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1600: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayaṃstamidaṃ vacaḥ // SkP_18.30 //
GP12skp031pu:1601: pitāmaha uvāca kṛtametanna saṃdeho yathā brūṣe mahāmate /
GP12skp031pu:1603: yaiste pitā mahābhāga bhakṣitaḥ saha sodaraiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1604: ta evāgnau ca hotavyā viśvāmitrasya paśyataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1605: anyeṣāṃ svasti sarvatra devānāṃ saha rākṣasaiḥ // SkP_18.32 //
GP12skp031pu:1607: vasiṣṭhasya mahābhāga tvaṃ nivāraya putraka // SkP_18.33 //
GP12skp031pu:1609: ṛṣayaścaiva te sarve vāgbhistuṣṭuvire tadā // SkP_18.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1611: viśvāmitrasya miṣata idaṃ provāca susvaram // SkP_18.35 //
GP12skp031pu:1612: ya eṣāṃ brāhmaṇo vāpi kṣatriyo vā durātmavān /
GP12skp031pu:1615: vihatya tapaso yogād dhoṣye dīpte vibhāvasau // SkP_18.37 //
GP12skp031pu:1616: sanatkumāra uvāca tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pitāmahapuraḥsarāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1617: prabhāvaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā parāśaramapūjayan // SkP_18.38 //
GP12skp031pu:1619: saṃjahāra tataḥ sattraṃ brahmaṇo 'numate tadā // SkP_18.39 //
GP12skp031pu:1620: sanatkumāra uvāca ya imaṃ śrāddhakāle vā daive karmaṇi vā dvijān /
GP12skp031pu:1621: śrāvayīta śucirbhūtvā na taṃ hiṃsanti rākṣasāḥ // SkP_18.40 //
GP12skp031pu:1623: niśāmya vipraḥ kulasiddhisambhavaṃ na rākṣasaṃ gacchati yonisambhavam //
GP12skp031pu:1626: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ tava pitā vyāsa rakṣaḥsattraṃ samāharat /
GP12skp031pu:1627: samāpayitvā ca punas tapastepe ca bhāsvaram // SkP_19.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1630: vasiṣṭha uvāca pitaraḥ putrakāmā vai tapaḥ kṛtvātiduścaram /
GP12skp031pu:1633: kariṣyati gatiṃ caiva iti vedavido viduḥ // SkP_19.4 //
GP12skp031pu:1635: putraḥ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vihīnaḥ prajayā vibho // SkP_19.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1637: sutamutpādaya kṣipram adhikaṃ samameva vā // SkP_19.6 //
GP12skp031pu:1639: mainākaṃ parvataṃ prāpya tapastepe suduścaram // SkP_19.7 //
GP12skp031pu:1640: tasya kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitasya tu /
GP12skp031pu:1641: umāpatirvaraṃ prādāt sa ca vavre sutaṃ śubham // SkP_19.8 //
GP12skp031pu:1643: kṣetraṃ supariśuddhaṃ ca svaputro yatra sambhavet // SkP_19.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1648: tasyāṃ sa janayāmāsa varaṃ dattvā mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1651: tasya putrāśca catvāraḥ kanyā caikā sumadhyamā // SkP_19.13 //
GP12skp031pu:1652: vyāsa uvāca kathaṃ vairaṃ samabhavad viśvāmitravasiṣṭhayoḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1653: kathaṃ cāpagataṃ bhūya etadicchāmi veditum // SkP_19.14 //
GP12skp031pu:1654: sanatkumāra uvāca parāśare tu garbhasthe vipratvaṃ gādhije gate /
GP12skp031pu:1657: miṣatastu vasiṣṭhasya hataṃ putraśataṃ ruṣā // SkP_19.16 //
GP12skp031pu:1661: saivamuktā tu taṃ gatvā vasiṣṭhaṃ prāha duḥkhitā /
GP12skp031pu:1662: yaduktavāṃstu gādheyaḥ sa covāca mahānadīm // SkP_19.18 //
GP12skp031pu:1663: evaṃ kuru mahābhāge māṃ nayasva yathepsitam /
GP12skp031pu:1664: mā te krūraḥ sa gādheyaḥ śāpaṃ dadyātsudustaram // SkP_19.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1665: sanatkumāra uvāca gādheyasya tataḥ sā tu juhvato 'gniṃ divākare /
GP12skp031pu:1666: madhyaṃ prāpte 'nayadvegād vasiṣṭhaṃ srotasā śubhā // SkP_19.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1675: vasiṣṭhasya ca tāṃ kṣāntiṃ jñātvā sa ṛṣipuṃgavaḥ // SkP_19.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1678: sanatkumāra uvāca ya imaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ brāhmaṇāñchrāvayīta vā /
GP12skp031pu:1681: bhavecca sarvāmararājatulyas tripiṣṭape krīḍati cecchayā svayam //
GP12skp031pu:1683: vairaṃ samāptaṃ lokānāṃ hitārthaṃ punareva ca // SkP_19.28 //
GP12skp031pu:1686: vyāsa uvāca umāharau tu deveśau cakraturyacca saṃgatau /
GP12skp031pu:1688: sanatkumāra uvāca umāharau tu saṃgamya parasparamaninditau /
GP12skp031pu:1689: śālaṅkasyānvaye vipraṃ yuyujāte vareṇa ha // SkP_20.2 //
GP12skp031pu:1692: vyāsa uvāca kathaṃ nandī samutpannaḥ kathaṃ cārādhya śaṃkaram /
GP12skp031pu:1694: sanatkumāra uvāca abhūdṛṣiḥ sa dharmātmā śilādo nāma vīryavān /
GP12skp031pu:1705: sraṣṭre sarvasureśānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ // SkP_20.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1708: ṛṣīṇāṃ pataye nityaṃ devānāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1709: vedānāṃ pataye caiva yogināṃ pataye namaḥ // SkP_20.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1711: varadāya ca bhaktānāṃ namaḥ sarvagatāya ca // SkP_20.13 //
GP12skp031pu:1713: sraṣṭre ca pataye caiva namaśca prabhaviṣṇave // SkP_20.14 //
GP12skp031pu:1714: jagataḥ pataye caiva jagatsraṣṭre namaḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:1725: prasādaṃ paramālambya varado bhava viśvakṛt // SkP_20.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1726: sanatkumāra uvāca yaḥ stotrametadakhilaṃ paṭhate dvijanmā prātaḥ śucirniyamavānpurato dvijānām
GP12skp031pu:1729: uvāca varado 'smīti brūhi yatte manogatam // SkP_20.22 //
GP12skp031pu:1731: uvāca cedaṃ deveśaṃ sa vācā sajjamānayā // SkP_20.23 //
GP12skp031pu:1732: bhagavanyadi tuṣṭo 'si yadi deyo varaśca me /
GP12skp031pu:1739: yiyakṣuryajñabhūmiṃ svāṃ lāṅgalena cakarṣa tām // SkP_20.27 //
GP12skp031pu:1742: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā tathodbhūtaṃ kumāraṃ dīptatejasam /
GP12skp031pu:1745: upāsarpata dīnātmā tāta tāteti cābravīt // SkP_20.30 //
GP12skp031pu:1747: tato vāyustamākāśe śilādaṃ prāha susvaram // SkP_20.31 //
GP12skp031pu:1748: vāyuruvāca śālaṅkāyana putraste yo 'sau devena śambhunā /
GP12skp031pu:1749: ayonijaḥ purā dattaḥ sa eṣa pratinandaya // SkP_20.32 //
GP12skp031pu:1752: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa vāyuvacanān nandinaṃ pariṣasvaje /
GP12skp031pu:1758: śilpāni caiva sarvāṇi nimittajñānameva ca // SkP_20.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1759: bhūtagrāmacikitsāṃ ca mātṝṇāṃ caritaṃ ca yat /
GP12skp031pu:1764: tasyātha saptame varṣe ṛṣī divyau tapodhanau /
GP12skp031pu:1778: tamāhūya sa tuṣṭyā tu putraṃ nandinamacyutam /
GP12skp031pu:1779: tayoḥ pādeṣu śirasā apātayata nandinam // SkP_20.46 //
GP12skp031pu:1780: tau tu tasyāśiṣaṃ devau prayuṅkto dharmanityatām /
GP12skp031pu:1784: śilāda uvāca bhagavantāvṛṣī satyau gatijñau sarvadehinām /
GP12skp031pu:1789: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa śokasaṃtapto nyapatadbhuvi duḥkhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1790: visṛjya ṛṣiśārdūlāv ekākī vilalāpa ca // SkP_20.51 //
GP12skp031pu:1791: tasya śokādvilapataḥ svaraṃ śrutvā sutaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1793: nandyuvāca kena tvaṃ tāta duḥkhena dūyamānaḥ prarodiṣi /
GP12skp031pu:1794: duḥkhaṃ te kuta udbhūtaṃ jñātumicchāmyahaṃ pitaḥ // SkP_20.53 //
GP12skp031pu:1795: śilāda uvāca putra tvaṃ kila varṣeṇa jīvitaṃ samprahāsyasi /
GP12skp031pu:1797: nandyuvāca satyaṃ devaṛṣī tāta na tāvanṛtamūcatuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1798: tathāpi tu na mṛtyurme prabhaviṣyati mā śucaḥ // SkP_20.55 //
GP12skp031pu:1799: śilāda uvāca kiṃ tapaḥ kiṃ parijñānaṃ ko yogaḥ kaḥ śramaśca te /
GP12skp031pu:1800: yena tvaṃ mṛtyumudyuktaṃ vañcayiṣyasi kathyatām // SkP_20.56 //
