GP12skp031pu:2334: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamabhavadvyāsa vivāhastasya dhīmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2336: tataḥ sa tu kṛtodvāho nandī gatvā mahāmanāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2337: pādānvavande devasya devyā brahmaṇa eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2338: śilādasya ca lokeśaḥ śriyā paramayā yutaḥ // SkP_25.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2339: deva uvāca varaṃ vṛṇīṣva putra tvaṃ snuṣā ceyaṃ tava priyā /
GP12skp031pu:2340: varaṃ dadāmi te vatsa anayā sahamīpsitam // SkP_25.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2341: nandyuvāca bhagavanyadi tuṣṭo 'si tvayi bhaktirdṛḍhāstu me /
GP12skp031pu:2342: sadā ca tuṣṭo bhava me sāmbaḥ saha gaṇeśvaraiḥ // SkP_25.15 //
GP12skp031pu:2343: pitaraṃ caiva me deva utpādakamimaṃ prabho /
GP12skp031pu:2345: deva uvāca sadāhaṃ tava nandīśa sutuṣṭaḥ sagaṇeśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2346: pārvatyā sahito dhīmann idaṃ ca śṛṇu me vacaḥ // SkP_25.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2349: ajayyaścaiva jetā ca pūjyejyaśca sadā bhava /
GP12skp031pu:2350: ahaṃ yatra bhavāṃstatra yatra tvaṃ tatra cāpyaham // SkP_25.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2351: ayaṃ ca te pitā vipraḥ paramaiśvaryasaṃyutaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2357: bhṛgau tasmiṃśca yaḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyate vai sudhārmikaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2358: sa kāmacārī vaibhrāje gaṇapo 'sya bhaviṣyati // SkP_25.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2359: sanatkumāra uvāca tato devī mahābhāgā śailāderadadadvaram /
GP12skp031pu:2362: varaṃ vṛṇu yatheṣṭaṃ vai tāvidaṃ pratyuvāca ha // SkP_25.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2363: yuvayorastu bhaktirme tathā bhartari caiva hi /
GP12skp031pu:2364: nityaṃ cānapagā syānme dharme ca matiruttamā /
GP12skp031pu:2367: ūcaturmuditau devau snuṣāṃ tāṃ varavarṇinīm // SkP_25.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2369: varaṃ dadurmahāsattvāḥ sa vavre kāñcanaprabhaḥ // SkP_25.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2370: yuṣmāsu mama bhaktiśca aiśvaryaṃ cāpi saṃmatam /
GP12skp031pu:2371: vaśyāśca yūyaṃ sarve me priyo yuṣmākameva ca // SkP_25.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2372: gaṇā ūcuḥ bhavānmantānumantā ca gatirāgatireva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2375: ītīnāṃ dvārapālaśca pramathānāṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_25.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2376: mahābalo mahāyogī senānīstvaṃ hi no mataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2377: tvaṃ bhūto bhūtanetā ca nāyako 'tha vināyakaḥ // SkP_25.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2379: tvamagrayodhī śatrughnas tvaṃ vīrastvaṃ divaspatiḥ // SkP_25.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2383: asmākaṃ varadaścaiva bhava bhūteśvara prabho // SkP_25.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2384: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evaṃ gaṇapaiḥ sarvaiḥ stuto nandīśvaro vibhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2385: uvāca praṇataḥ sarvān brūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ // SkP_25.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2386: ta evamuktā gaṇapāḥ sarva eva mahābalāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2392: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktastadā sarvān praṇamya bahumānataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2394: nandyuvāca namo vaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo namo yogibhya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2396: namaḥ kāmacarebhyaśca nama ugrebhya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2397: mṛtyubhyaśca yamebhyaśca kālebhyaśca namo namaḥ // SkP_25.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2399: namo vo vadhakebhyaśca avadhyebhyastathaiva ca // SkP_25.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2403: namaḥ śvetāmbarasragbhyaś citrasragbhyo namo namaḥ // SkP_25.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2405: namo munibhyo gāyadbhyo japadbhyaśca namo namaḥ // SkP_25.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2407: namaḥ parvatavāsebhyo vyāghrarūpebhya eva ca // SkP_25.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2411: namo dhaneśarūpebhyaḥ sarvarūpibhya eva ca // SkP_25.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2413: namo vāmanarūpebhyo vāmarūpebhya eva ca // SkP_25.49 //
GP12skp031pu:2415: namo vaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ namo vaḥ sarvataḥ śubhāḥ // SkP_25.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2418: mama saumyāḥ śivāścaiva bhavantu gaṇanāyakāḥ // SkP_25.51 //
GP12skp031pu:2419: iti stutā gaṇapatayo mahābalāḥ śubhairvacobhiḥ suraśatrunāśanāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2420: diśantu me sukhamatulaṃ sukhapradā balaṃ ca vīryaṃ sthiratāṃ ca saṃyuge //
GP12skp031pu:2421: tapo 'kṣayaṃ sthānamathātulāṃ gatiṃ yaśastathāgryaṃ bahu dharmanityatām /
GP12skp031pu:2422: diśantu sarvaṃ manasepsitaṃ ca me sureśvarāḥ puṣṭimanuttamāṃ tathā //
GP12skp031pu:2423: sanatkumāra uvāca imau nandigaṇendrāṇāṃ stavau yo 'dhyeti nityaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2427: sanatkumāra uvāca tataste gaṇapāḥ sarve saṃstutāstena dhīmatā /
GP12skp031pu:2428: nisṛṣṭāśca tadā jagmuḥ praṇipatya vṛṣadhvajam // SkP_25.56 //
GP12skp031pu:2429: devāśca sarvalokāśca tato devaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2431: īpsitaṃ saha devyā vai jagāma sthānamavyayam // SkP_25.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2432: ya imaṃ nandino janma varadānaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2433: abhiṣekaṃ vivāhaṃ ca paṭhedvā śrāvayīta vā /
GP12skp031pu:2434: brāhmaṇaḥ sa mṛto yāti nandīśvarasalokatām // SkP_25.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2435: yo niyatastu paṭhetprayatātmā sarvamimaṃ praṇato bhavabhaktyā /
GP12skp031pu:2436: so 'pi gataḥ paralokavicārī nandisamo 'nucaro hi mama syāt // SkP_25.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2438: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ nandīśvaro vyāsa utpanno 'nucaraśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:2440: vyāsa uvāca devyā sahātha bhagavān āsīnastatra kāmadaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2442: sanatkumāra uvāca bhagavānhimavacchṛṅge śarvo devyāḥ priyepsayā /
GP12skp031pu:2447: āsīnāṃ kāñcane śubhre āsane paramārcite // SkP_26.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2448: atha dṛṣṭvā satīṃ devīm āgatāṃ tu surūpiṇīm /
GP12skp031pu:2450: āsīnāṃ tāṃ ca sovāca menā himavataḥ priyā /
GP12skp031pu:2452: daridrakrīḍanaistvaṃ hi bhartrā krīḍasi saṃgatā // SkP_26.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2453: ye daridrā bhavanti sma tathaiva ca nirāśrayāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2454: ume ta evaṃ krīḍanti yathā tava patiḥ śubhe // SkP_26.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2455: sanatkumāra uvāca saivamuktā tu mātrātha nātihṛṣṭamanābhavat /
GP12skp031pu:2456: mahatyākṣamayā yuktā na kiṃcittāmuvāca ha // SkP_26.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2457: visṛṣṭā sā tadā mātrā gatvā devamuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:2459: anyaṃ vṛṇu mamāvāsaṃ bhuvaneśa mahādyute // SkP_26.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2460: deva uvāca sadā tvamucyamānā vai mayā vāsārthamīśvari /
GP12skp031pu:2461: anyatra rocitavatī nāvāsaṃ devi karhicit // SkP_26.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2463: kasmānmṛgayase devi brūhi tanme śucismite // SkP_26.12 //
GP12skp031pu:2464: devyuvāca gṛhaṃ gatāhaṃ deveśa pituradya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2465: dṛṣṭvā ca me tatra mātā vijane lokabhāvanī // SkP_26.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2467: ume tava sadā bhartā daridrakrīḍanaiḥ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2468: krīḍate na hi devānāṃ krīḍā bhavati tādṛśī // SkP_26.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2470: ramase tadaniṣṭaṃ hi mama māturvṛṣadhvaja // SkP_26.15 //
GP12skp031pu:2471: sanatkumāra uvāca tato devaḥ prahasyāha devīṃ hāsayituṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2476: mā krudho devi mātustvaṃ tathyaṃ mātāvadattava /
GP12skp031pu:2477: na hi mātṛsamo bandhur jantūnāmasti śobhane // SkP_26.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2478: devyuvāca na me 'sti bandhubhiḥ kiṃcit kṛtyaṃ suravareśvara /
GP12skp031pu:2479: tathā kuru mahādeva yathānyatra vasāmahe // SkP_26.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2480: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamukto deveśo devyā deveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2481: pārśvasthaṃ gaṇapaṃ prāha nikumbhaṃ nāma viśrutam // SkP_26.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2482: gaṇeśvara nikumbha tvaṃ gatvā vārāṇasīṃ śubhām /
GP12skp031pu:2483: śūnyāṃ kuru mahābāho upāyenaiva mā balāt // SkP_26.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2485: dhārmiko mama bhaktaśca mahāyogī mahābalaḥ // SkP_26.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2486: sa tvaṃ tathā gataḥ kuryā yathāsmai nāparādhyase /
GP12skp031pu:2487: tasyaiva cāparādhena śūnyāṃ vārāṇasīṃ kuru // SkP_26.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2488: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamuktastejasvī nikumbho gaṇasattamaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2490: tathā kariṣye deveśa yathā sa hi narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2492: śūnyā vārāṇasī caiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_26.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2493: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā nikumbho 'sau praṇamya śirasā haram /
GP12skp031pu:2494: jagāma puṇyāṃ lokeṣu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ prabhuḥ // SkP_26.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2495: tatrāsau darśanaṃ svapne nāpitāya dadau gaṇaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2496: maṇḍūkākṣāya rūpaṃ ca svaṃ tasyādarśayattadā // SkP_26.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2497: nikumbha uvāca maṇḍūkākṣa nikumbho 'haṃ gaṇapaḥ śokanāśanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2500: sthāpayasva ca tatrārcāṃ madrūpasadṛśīṃ śubhām // SkP_26.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2501: vittaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi putrānsaubhāgyameva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2502: priyatvaṃ caiva sarvatra gatiṃ cānuttamāṃ punaḥ // SkP_26.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2503: sanatkumāra uvāca evamukto nikumbhena nāpito nṛpatiṃ tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2505: nāpita uvāca svāmiṃstava gṛhadvāri kariṣye gaṇapālayam /
GP12skp031pu:2509: tasya pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāvartayata śobhanām /
GP12skp031pu:2510: gaṇeśasya mahāsattvaḥ sa ca tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata // SkP_26.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2511: sa tasmai karmaṇā tena vittaṃ yadyatsamīhitam /
GP12skp031pu:2512: paśūṃścaiva hi putrāṃśca saubhāgyaṃ cādadatprabhuḥ // SkP_26.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2514: ārirādhayiṣurlokast asya pūjāṃ cakāra ha // SkP_26.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2516: homaṃ japyaṃ tathaivānye pūjāṃ cānye varārthinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2519: dadau sarvānabhiprāyān ye ye teṣāmabhīpsitāḥ // SkP_26.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2520: evaṃ taṃ kāmadaṃ jñātvā divodāso nṛpastadā /
GP12skp031pu:2524: saivamuktā tadā gatvā gaṇeśaṃ prāpya śobhanā /
GP12skp031pu:2527: tāvanna bhokṣye yāvanme varo 'dattastvayā prabho // SkP_26.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2528: jāte ca putre dāsyāmi śatānāṃ daśatīrdaśa /
GP12skp031pu:2531: kṣīrasya pañcagavyasya kariṣye snapanaṃ ca te // SkP_26.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2533: purastādbhojayiṣye te putre jāte na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_26.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2535: sadā sattraṃ ca pūjāṃ ca kariṣyati tava prabho // SkP_26.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2536: sanatkumāra uvāca sā tamuktvā tathā vyāsa tasthau niyamamāsthitā /
GP12skp031pu:2537: sopavāsā tadā pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tasya kurvatī // SkP_26.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2538: tāṃ tathā tiṣṭhatīṃ devaḥ provāca sa gaṇeśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2539: uttiṣṭha nāsti te putro mā khedaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2542: tato narādhipaṃ devī provāca vimanā tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2543: āryaputra na me putraṃ gaṇapo 'sau prayacchati /
GP12skp031pu:2544: bravīti nāsti te putro mā vṛthā niyamaṃ kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2545: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ mahiṣyā sa proktaḥ svayameva narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2548: mā sthā vṛtheha nṛpate na te putraṃ dadāmyaham // SkP_26.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2551: rājovāca gaṇo vā tvaṃ piśāco vā bhūto vā rākṣaso 'pi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2552: kṛtaghnastvaṃ na saṃdeho na tvaṃ pūjāmihārhasi // SkP_26.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2554: viṣaye mama vāsī ca na ca putraṃ prayacchasi // SkP_26.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2555: pūjārho na bhavāṃstasmān matto daṇḍaṃ tvamarhasi /
GP12skp031pu:2558: sthaṇḍilaṃ ca babhañjāśu dadāhārcāṃ ca suprabhām // SkP_26.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2559: nikumbho 'pi kṛtārthaḥ sann ākāśe saṃsthitaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2560: uvāca taṃ divodāsaṃ pradahanniva tejasā // SkP_26.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2562: na datto yadyasau kopaḥ kastatra bhavato 'bhavat // SkP_26.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2564: tasmādvarṣasahasraṃ te purī śūnyā bhaviṣyati // SkP_26.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2565: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamuktvā rājānaṃ nikumbhaḥ paramātmavān /
GP12skp031pu:2566: deveśāya nivedyaivaṃ tasthau pārśvagataḥ prabhoḥ // SkP_26.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2567: rājāpi tasya vākyena tathyenārthena caiva hi /
GP12skp031pu:2569: atha sā tena śāpena purī vārāṇasī tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2571: tāṃ tu śūnyāṃ sa vijñāya devyā saha pinākadhṛk /
GP12skp031pu:2572: sagaṇo nandinā sārdham ājagāma mahādyutiḥ // SkP_26.64 //
GP12skp031pu:2573: sa tatra mānasaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ sūryavarcasam /
GP12skp031pu:2576: etāvacchakyate vaktum anaupamyaguṇaṃ hi tat // SkP_26.66 //
GP12skp031pu:2580: reme navendīvaraphullanetrā devī na sasmāra vacaśca mātuḥ // SkP_26.68 //
GP12skp031pu:2587: kathayaitanmama vibho yattvāṃ pṛcchāmi mānada // SkP_27.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2588: kiṃ phalaṃ tava deveśa labhante bhaktavatsala /
GP12skp031pu:2589: bhaktā ye phalamuddiśya kurvate tava kiṃcana // SkP_27.4 //
GP12skp031pu:2590: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamumayā proktaḥ śūlapāṇirvṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2592: vyāsa uvāca kiṃ tatsa bhagavāndevaḥ prīyamāṇo mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2594: sanatkumāra uvāca mayāpyetatpurā vyāsa pṛṣṭo nandīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2595: yathoktavānmayi brahmaṃs tathā tatkathayāmi te // SkP_27.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2599: tanme brūhi yathātattvaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // SkP_27.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2601: devadevena pārvatyā yatpurā kathitaṃ hitam // SkP_27.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2602: deva uvāca śrūyatāmabhidhāsyāmi yanmāṃ pṛcchasi suvrate /
GP12skp031pu:2603: hitāya devi bhaktānāṃ pṛṣṭaste kathayāmi te // SkP_27.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2604: prāsādaṃ yastu me devi śubhraṃ kuryādanindite /
GP12skp031pu:2606: vidhānena yathoktena liṅgaṃ me sthāpayecca yaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2607: carate sa mayā sārdhaṃ nityamaṣṭaguṇānvitaḥ // SkP_27.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2608: kāñcanaṃ tuṭimātraṃ vā yo dadyādbahu vā mama /
GP12skp031pu:2609: tasya haimavate śṛṅge dadāni gṛhamuttamam // SkP_27.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2610: yo me gāstu hiraṇyaṃ vā dadyādavimanāḥ priye /
GP12skp031pu:2612: vṛṣabhaṃ yaḥ prayaccheta śvetaṃ nīlamathāpi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2615: sa me puraṃ samāsādya gaṇeśaiḥ saha modate // SkP_27.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2616: yo me puṇyaphalaṃ dadyād ātmanā pūrvamārjitam /
GP12skp031pu:2619: rathena vṛṣayuktena mama loke sa modate // SkP_27.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2621: dadāni brahmaṇo loke vāsaṃ tasya supūjitam // SkP_27.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2623: aśakto nāsti ca dravyaṃ yasya nityaṃ sumadhyame // SkP_27.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2624: sa tayā śraddhayā pūto vimuktaḥ sarvapātakaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2625: mama lokamavāpnoti bhinne dehe na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_27.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2627: sa mitraṃ yakṣarājasya yakṣo bhavati vīryavān // SkP_27.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2629: gandhāśca daśasāhasrā ānantyaṃ cārcanaṃ smṛtam // SkP_27.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2631: gandhodakaṃ pañcaśataṃ pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_27.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2633: tasmācca sarpiṣā snānaṃ bhūyaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā // SkP_27.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2640: dve sahasre palānāṃ tu mahiṣākṣasya yo dahet /
GP12skp031pu:2641: devi saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2642: dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu yo mūrtau pāyasaṃ saghṛtaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2643: nivedayedvarṣamekaṃ sa ca nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2645: śeṣāśca caravaḥ sarve yāvakārdhena saṃmitāḥ // SkP_27.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2647: prīṇāti ca pitṝnsarvān vimāne caiva modate /
GP12skp031pu:2648: chattraṃ dadyācca yaḥ so 'pi dīpyate tejasā divi // SkP_27.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2651: dadānyasya svakaṃ lokaṃ tuṣṭo 'haṃ devi śāśvatam // SkP_27.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2653: pūjito 'haṃ sadā bhaktyā putratve kalpayāmi tam // SkP_27.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2654: ekarātraṃ ca yo martyo dīpaṃ dhārayati sthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2655: sarvayajñaphalaṃ tasya dadāni śriyameva ca // SkP_27.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2657: na māṃ paśyanti rāgāndhās tamasā bahulīkṛtāḥ // SkP_27.37 //
GP12skp031pu:2659: ekāgramanaso dāntās te māṃ paśyanti nityadā // SkP_27.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2660: ye me bhaktāḥ sadā caiva sāṃkhyayogaviśāradāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2661: sarvaṃ paśyanti ca mayi māṃ ca sarvatra yogataḥ // SkP_27.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2663: gacchanti mama te lokaṃ tamo bhittvā sudurbhidam // SkP_27.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2665: dhyānino nityayuktāśca devi paśyanti māṃ budhāḥ // SkP_27.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2667: pādayostāni suśroṇi sadā saṃnihitāni me // SkP_27.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2669: mamaiva sa prabhāvena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // SkP_27.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2670: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi devi yo māṃ sadā smaret /
GP12skp031pu:2671: kalmaṣeṇa na yujyeta naraḥ kartā kadācana // SkP_27.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2673: yo 'bhyarcayati māṃ nityaṃ sa mamātmasamo bhavet // SkP_27.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2674: ṣaḍaṅgena ca yogena yo māmarcayate sadā /
GP12skp031pu:2675: praviśeta sa māṃ kṣipram atra nāsti vicāraṇā // SkP_27.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2677: so 'pi madgatamanā madarpaṇo yāti devi gatimapratarkitām // SkP_27.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2679: sanatkumāra uvāca tato vyāsa punardevī patiṃ vratapatiṃ śubhā /
GP12skp031pu:2682: vrataṃ bhavati yādṛgvā tatprabrūhi maheśvara // SkP_28.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2683: deva uvāca mahāphalaṃ yadbhavati yaccāpyalpaphalaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2688: taccaiva phalamāpnoti yamaṃ caiva na paśyati // SkP_28.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2690: sa tapyatyā nakhāgrebhyo nityaṃ yo māṃ samāśritaḥ // SkP_28.6 //
GP12skp031pu:2693: pṛthivībhājane bhuṅkte nityaṃ parvasu yo naraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2694: sa trirātraphalaṃ devi ahorātreṇa vindati // SkP_28.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2695: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yo bhuṅkte nityameva hyatandritaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2698: yo bhuṅkte devi naiteṣu saṃyatastu naraḥ samām // SkP_28.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2700: bhūtānāṃ dayitaścaiva divyaṃ rūpaṃ bibharti ca // SkP_28.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2704: sa vai varṣasahasrāṇi dviṣaṣṭiṃ divi modate /
GP12skp031pu:2705: divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān devataiḥ saha nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2711: candanaṃ caiva dadyādvai yathāsaṃkhyena pūjitam // SkP_28.16 //
GP12skp031pu:2715: iha loke sukhī jāto māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2716: ratnāvaliṃ tu yo dadyād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo 'tha viṭ /
GP12skp031pu:2717: śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke matsaukhyaṃ prāpnute param // SkP_28.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2721: manvantaraṃ ca goloke gokanyābhiḥ sa pūjyate // SkP_28.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2722: sarve devāstathā viṣṇur brahmā ṛṣaya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2723: kurvantyarghe hi sāṃnidhyaṃ tebhyastadviddhi niḥsṛtam // SkP_28.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2724: guhyametatparaṃ devi yo vetti sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2727: kṣīreṇa yo māṃ satataṃ snāpayeta trirudyataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2730: mānasasya ca jāpyasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2731: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kṣīreṇa snapanaṃ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2732: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate vallabhatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2734: dvisāhasrasya jāpyasya mānasasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2736: niṣkāṇāṃ ca suvarṇasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2738: vitarāmi śubhaṃ lokaṃ nityaṃ tasya dhruvaṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:2739: sarvalokakṣaye tasya na kṣayo bhavatīśvari // SkP_28.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2740: liṅgapūjāṃ tu yaḥ kuryān mama devi dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2741: śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divyāni divi modate // SkP_28.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2743: arkasya karavīrasya bilvasya ca bukasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:2744: suvarṇaniṣkaṃ puṣpe tu sarvasminneva kathyate // SkP_28.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2746: ekasminkaravīrasya datte puṣpe hi tatphalam // SkP_28.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2748: tadekasya tu padmasya dattasya phalamucyate // SkP_28.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2749: padmānāṃ tu sahasrasya mama dattasya yatphalam /
GP12skp031pu:2750: tatphalaṃ labhate pattre datte bilvasya śobhane // SkP_28.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2751: bilvapattrasahasre tu datte me yatphalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12skp031pu:2752: bukapuṣpe tadekasmin mama datte labhetphalam // SkP_28.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2754: puṣpe datte tadekasmiṃl labheddhuttūrakasya tu // SkP_28.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2755: nirmālyaṃ yo hi me nityaṃ śirasā dhārayiṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:2758: narake sa patedghore tiryagyonau ca sambhavet // SkP_28.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2760: tasya pāpamahaṃ śīghraṃ nāśayāmi mahāvrate // SkP_28.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2761: dīpamālāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kārttike māsi vai mama /
GP12skp031pu:2763: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate dīpyate ca raviryathā // SkP_28.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2765: yo me devi sadā mūrdhni sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_28.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2766: ye hi siddhārthakāḥ proktās tathā kṛṣṇatilāśca ye /
GP12skp031pu:2767: sarve te tvanmayā devi guhyametanmayeritam // SkP_28.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2768: citro nāma gaṇo mahyaṃ tena sārdhaṃ sa modate /
GP12skp031pu:2770: tyaktvā sarvāṇi duḥkhāni māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2774: sa prayāti divaṃ devi liṅgaṃ yo 'rcayatīha me // SkP_28.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2777: sanatkumāra uvāca tato bhagavatī bhūyaḥ patiṃ sarvajagatpatim /
GP12skp031pu:2778: apṛcchatpuṣpyamāṇāsyā kena tvaṃ deva tuṣyasi // SkP_28.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2780: vacaḥ provāca bhagavāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // SkP_28.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2781: deva uvāca śṛṇu devi yathātattvaṃ yena yānti śubhāṃ gatim /
GP12skp031pu:2782: trailokye jantavaḥ sarve madbhaktā ye śubhānane // SkP_28.49 //
GP12skp031pu:2784: yo hi tattvena tadveda saṃsārādvipramucyate // SkP_28.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2785: na ca prakāśayedguhyaṃ nāma te kīrtayennaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2788: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca samprāpya rudraloke mahīyate // SkP_28.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2790: mantreṇa vidhivaccaiva tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // SkP_28.53 //
GP12skp031pu:2792: namo bhagavate caiva guhyāguhyāya vai sadā // SkP_28.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2794: sarvaguhyāya vai svāhā devaguhyamayāya ca // SkP_28.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2795: sarvaguhyamayo mantraḥ svāhā somāya caiva ha /
GP12skp031pu:2796: kaṭaṃkaṭāya vai svāhā svāhā devāya śuṣmiṇe // SkP_28.56 //
GP12skp031pu:2797: puṣpāṇyetena mantreṇa yo me nityaṃ nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:2798: sahasraṃ tena jāpyasya mānasasya kṛtaṃ bhavet // SkP_28.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2800: tilānāṃ caiva kṛṣṇānāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pārvati /
GP12skp031pu:2802: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ brūyāt sūryeti ca mameti ca /
GP12skp031pu:2804: arcayitvā ca māṃ devi yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:2806: so 'pi devi prapaśyenmāṃ viyoniṃ na sa gacchati // SkP_28.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2807: vāmadeva sudeveti hara gupteti vā punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2808: umāpate nīlakaṇṭha śānta śrīkaṇṭha gopate // SkP_28.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2809: śarva bhīma paśupate śaṃkarogra bhaveti ca /
GP12skp031pu:2811: sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta divi devaiśca pūjyate // SkP_28.62 //
GP12skp031pu:2815: amāvāsyāṃ tu yo nityaṃ saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ dahet /
GP12skp031pu:2818: idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ yo me devi nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:2821: imāni ca mahābhāge yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:2828: mahādevo mahādevo mahādeveti caiva hi // SkP_28.69 //
GP12skp031pu:2830: sa dehabhedamāsādya yogātmā gaṇapo bhavet // SkP_28.70 //
GP12skp031pu:2831: sanatkumāra uvāca nāśubhāya na pāpāya nānṛtāya kadācana /
GP12skp031pu:2834: pūtaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12skp031pu:2835: śrotavyaṃ na ca sarveṇa tathā deyaṃ na kasyacit // SkP_28.72 //
GP12skp031pu:2837: vyāsa uvāca evaṃ kālena samprāpya vārāṇasyāṃ niketanam /
GP12skp031pu:2838: jagataḥ pitarau devau cakratuḥ kimataḥ param // SkP_29.1 //
GP12skp031pu:2839: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo devīṃ himavataḥ sutām /
GP12skp031pu:2840: uvāca devi paśyāma udyānaṃ yadi rocate // SkP_29.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2841: devyuvāca evaṃ bhavatu deveśa yathāttha tvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12skp031pu:2842: na hi me 'nyatra gantavyam udyānātparato hara // SkP_29.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2843: sanatkumāra uvāca saha devyā tato vyāsa vārāṇasyāṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2851: saṃyuktaṃ sarvataḥ śrīmad vanaṃ vaibhrājasaṃnibham // SkP_29.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2853: asmindeśe purā devi tiṣṭhato mama śobhane // SkP_29.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2855: pīyatīnāṃ payo vegāt phenaṃ mūrdhni samāpatat // SkP_29.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2862: āśritaḥ soma āgatya saha gobhirna tāstyajat // SkP_29.12 //
GP12skp031pu:2865: na naśyanti yathā sadyas tathā sarvasurārcita // SkP_29.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2867: goprekṣaka iti khyātaḥ saṃstutaḥ sarvadevataiḥ // SkP_29.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2874: sāṃnidhyaṃ kṛtavāndevi sa cāyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sthitaḥ // SkP_29.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2878: labhate dehabhede tu gaṇatvaṃ cātidurlabham // SkP_29.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2879: asminnapi pradeśe tu tā gāvo brahmaṇā svayam /
GP12skp031pu:2880: śāntyarthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvā dugdhāḥ payomṛtam // SkP_29.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2882: bhadradohamiti khyātaṃ puṇyaṃ devavanaṃ śubham // SkP_29.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2888: brahmaṇaścāpi saṃgṛhya viṣṇunā sthāpitaḥ punaḥ // SkP_29.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2889: brahmaṇā sa tato viṣṇuḥ proktaḥ saṃvignacetasā /
GP12skp031pu:2895: dṛṣṭvainamapi deveśaṃ mama lokaṃ vrajennaraḥ // SkP_29.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2896: punaścāpi tato brahmā mama liṅgamimaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2900: tasmātsvarlīna ityevaṃ guhyaṃ kṣetraṃ mama smṛtam // SkP_29.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2902: ānantyā sā gatistasya yogināṃ caiva sā smṛtā // SkP_29.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2904: vyāghrarūpaṃ samāsthāya nihato darpito balī // SkP_29.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2907: utpalo vidalaścaiva yau daityau brahmaṇā purā /
GP12skp031pu:2908: strīvadhyau darpitau sṛṣṭau tvayaiva nihatau śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2911: jyeṣṭhaṃ sthānamidaṃ tasmād etanme puṇyadarśanam // SkP_29.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2913: na śocati punarmartyaḥ saṃsiddho mṛtyujanmanī // SkP_29.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2915: dṛṣṭvā tu niyato martyo dehabhede gaṇo bhavet // SkP_29.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2917: na ca muktaṃ mayā yasmād avimuktamidaṃ tataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2918: kṣetraṃ vārāṇasī puṇyā muktidaṃ sambhaviṣyati // SkP_29.37 //
GP12skp031pu:2919: avimukteśvaraṃ māṃ vai yo 'tra drakṣyati mānavaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2920: gāṇapatyā gatistasya yatra tatra mṛtasya ha /
GP12skp031pu:2921: prāṇāniha tu saṃnyasya yāsyate muktimuttamām // SkP_29.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2922: pitrā te girirājena purā himavatā svayam /
GP12skp031pu:2923: mama priyamidaṃ sthānaṃ jñātvā liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // SkP_29.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2925: dṛṣṭvedaṃ manujo devi na durgatimanuvrajet // SkP_29.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2930: saṃgame devanadyostu yaḥ snātvā manujaḥ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2933: kṣetramadhye ca yatrāhaṃ svayaṃ bhūtvā samāsthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2937: dṛṣṭvedaṃ madhyameśānaṃ janma prati na śocati // SkP_29.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2941: mṛtaśca na punarjanma saṃsāre tu labhennaraḥ // SkP_29.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2948: paśya liṅgāni puṇyāni sarvakāmapradāni tu // SkP_29.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2950: kathitāni tava kṣetre guhyaṃ cānyadidaṃ śṛṇu // SkP_29.51 //
GP12skp031pu:2957: smṛtaṃ puṇyatamaṃ kṣetram avimuktamidaṃ śubhe // SkP_29.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2959: mama puṇyāni bhūrloke tebhyaḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tvidam // SkP_29.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2960: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni lokāni tataḥ kṣetramidaṃ śubham /
GP12skp031pu:2961: kadācinna mayā muktam avimuktaṃ tato 'bhavat // SkP_29.56 //
GP12skp031pu:2968: dṛṣṭvā na jāyate martyaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasāgare // SkP_29.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2970: vilokya saṃsthite paścād devadeve maheśvare // SkP_29.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2980: sthitānāṃ sa tathā teṣāṃ devadeva umāpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2981: saṃcintya paramāṃ mūrtiṃ babhūva puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ // SkP_29.65 //
GP12skp031pu:2984: tasya tāṃ paramāṃ mūrtim āsthitasya jagatprabhoḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2985: na śaśāka vapurdraṣṭuṃ hṛṣṭaromā girīndrajā // SkP_29.67 //
GP12skp031pu:2988: taṃ śaśāka vapurdraṣṭuṃ puruṣasya parātmanaḥ // SkP_29.68 //
GP12skp031pu:2994: stunvantī caraṇau gatvā ka ime bhagavanniti // SkP_29.71 //
GP12skp031pu:2998: kṣetrasyāsya prabhāvena bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2999: anugraho mayā hyevaṃ kriyate muktidaḥ sadā // SkP_29.73 //
GP12skp031pu:3011: puṣkaraṃ naimiśaṃ caiva prayāgaṃ sapṛthūdakam // SkP_29.79 //
GP12skp031pu:3012: sandhyā saptaṛcaṃ caiva sarvānadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12skp031pu:3017: praviśanti sadābhyetya puṇyaṃ parvasu parvasu // SkP_29.81 //
GP12skp031pu:3018: kedāre caiva yalliṅgaṃ yacca liṅgaṃ mahālaye /
GP12skp031pu:3020: śaṅkukarṇeśvaraṃ caiva gokarṇe ca tathā hyubhau /
GP12skp031pu:3021: drimicaṇḍeśvaraṃ caiva bhadreśvara tathaiva ca // SkP_29.83 //
GP12skp031pu:3024: yāni cānyāni puṇyāni sthānāni mama bhūtale /
GP12skp031pu:3025: tāni sarvāṇyaśeṣeṇa kāśipuryāṃ viśanti mām // SkP_29.85 //
GP12skp031pu:3027: teneha labhyate jantor vipannasyāmṛtaṃ padam // SkP_29.86 //
GP12skp031pu:3028: snātasya caiva gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭena ca mayā śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:3030: sadya eva-m-avāpnoti kiṃ nvataḥ paramasti vai // SkP_29.87 //
GP12skp031pu:3032: nātaḥ parataraṃ devi budhyasvāstīti kṛtsnaśaḥ // SkP_29.88 //
GP12skp031pu:3035: sthānaṃ mamedaṃ himaśailaputri guhyaṃ sadā kṣetramidaṃ supuṇyam /
GP12skp031pu:3036: vimokṣasaṃsiddhiphalapradaṃ hi tattvaprabuddhā yatayo vadanti // SkP_29.90
GP12skp031pu:3037: kṣetre 'sminnivasanti ye sukṛtino bhaktāḥ sadā māṃ narāḥ paśyanto
GP12skp031pu:3039: te martyā bhayapāpaduḥkharahitāḥ saṃśuddhakarmakriyā bhittvā sambhavabandhajālagahanaṃ vindanti mokṣaṃ param // SkP_29.91 //
GP12skp031pu:3041: jāhnavyālaṃkṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ kṣetraṃ guhyatamaṃ mama // SkP_29.92 //
GP12skp031pu:3043: aśvamedhaśataṃ prāpya brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati // SkP_29.93 //
GP12skp031pu:3044: nātaḥ puṇyatamaṃ devi nāto guhyatamaṃ kvacit /
GP12skp031pu:3045: nātaḥ śubhataraṃ kiṃcin nātaḥ priyataraṃ mama // SkP_29.94 //
GP12skp031pu:3046: kṣetraṃ mamedaṃ surasiddhajuṣṭaṃ samprāpya martyaḥ sukṛtaprabhāvāt /
GP12skp031pu:3047: khyāto bhavetsarvasurāsurāṇāṃ mṛtaśca yāyātparamaṃ padaṃ tam // SkP_29.95
GP12skp031pu:3048: sanatkumāra uvāca udyānāni tato devaḥ sthānāni ca tathātmanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3049: ākhyāya himavatputryā vicacāra tadā punaḥ // SkP_29.96 //
GP12skp031pu:3050: so 'paśyata tadā vipraṃ tapyamānaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3054: japyena vṛṣanādaiśca tapasā bhāvitaḥ śuciḥ // SkP_29.98 //
GP12skp031pu:3055: tamevaṃ vartamānaṃ tu bhaktyā paramayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:3058: tuṣṭo 'smi varadaścaiva brūhi yatte manogatam // SkP_29.100 //
GP12skp031pu:3059: sa evamukto devena somaṃ dṛṣṭvā trilocanam /
GP12skp031pu:3060: praṇamya śirasā pādāv avandatparayā mudā // SkP_29.101 //
GP12skp031pu:3061: jaigīṣavya uvāca namaḥ sarvārthasiddhāya yogasiddhāya vai namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3064: namaḥ somāya hemne ca hemamālādharāya ca // SkP_29.103 //
GP12skp031pu:3068: namaḥ siddhipradātre ca siddhisiddhāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.105 //
GP12skp031pu:3072: svayaṃmantre ca manase durvijñeyāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.107 //
GP12skp031pu:3078: saktāya caiva tapasi aiśvaryaniratāya ca // SkP_29.110 //
GP12skp031pu:3084: mahyaṃ sarvātmanā kāmān prayaccha bhagavanprabho // SkP_29.113 //
GP12skp031pu:3085: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evaṃ stūyamānaśca bhaktyā paramayāpi ca /
GP12skp031pu:3086: tuṣṭastutoṣa bhūyo 'sya idaṃ cainamuvāca ha // SkP_29.114 //
GP12skp031pu:3093: yonayaḥ sapta gatvā tu yogaṃ sa samavāpsyati // SkP_29.117 //
GP12skp031pu:3094: jaigīṣavyaguhāṃ cemāṃ prāpya yo yokṣyate dvijaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3095: sa saptarātraṃ yuktātmā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // SkP_29.118 //
GP12skp031pu:3096: māsena pūrvāṃ jātiṃ ca pūrvādhītaṃ ca vetsyati /
GP12skp031pu:3097: ekarātraṃ gatiṃ śuddhāṃ dvābhyāṃ tārayate pitṝn // SkP_29.119 //
GP12skp031pu:3099: ato bhūyaśca kiṃ te 'dya jaigīṣavya dadānyaham // SkP_29.120 //
GP12skp031pu:3100: jaigīṣavya uvāca bhagavandevadeveśa yaccha yanme manogatam /
GP12skp031pu:3102: tvayi bhaktiśca nityaṃ syāt some sagaṇapeśvare /
GP12skp031pu:3103: anutsekaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ śamaṃ damamathāpi ca // SkP_29.122 //
GP12skp031pu:3104: na cāpyabhibhavaṃ kuryān na ca tejovamānanām /
GP12skp031pu:3106: deva uvāca ete tava bhaviṣyanti ajayyatvaṃ ca yogibhiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3107: icchato darśanaṃ caiva bhaviṣyati ca te mama // SkP_29.124 //
GP12skp031pu:3108: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa bhagavāndevaḥ pārāśaryomayā saha /
GP12skp031pu:3113: tapyamānaṃ tapo ghoraṃ sutaṃ viśravasastadā // SkP_29.127 //
GP12skp031pu:3116: deva uvāca bho bho viśravasaḥ putra cakṣurdivyaṃ dadāni te /
GP12skp031pu:3117: somaṃ paśya mahāsattva māṃ tvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā // SkP_29.129 //
GP12skp031pu:3118: tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā deveśaṃ sāmbaṃ nandipuraḥsaram /
GP12skp031pu:3119: praṇamya karṣitaḥ samyag utthātuṃ na śaśāka ha // SkP_29.130 //
GP12skp031pu:3121: uvācottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te balaṃ paurāṇamastu te // SkP_29.131 //
GP12skp031pu:3127: yā prabhoḥ sarvalokasya patnītvaṃ prajagāma ha // SkP_29.134 //
GP12skp031pu:3128: sanatkumāra uvāca tamevaṃbhūtamanasam īkṣamāṇaṃ ca pārvatīm /
GP12skp031pu:3129: bubodha devī buddhvā ca cukopa parameśvarī // SkP_29.135 //
GP12skp031pu:3130: sā kruddhā tu kuberasya vāmamakṣi sudīptimat /
GP12skp031pu:3131: viśuṣkaṃ kakṣamādīptā dadāhāgneḥ śikhā yathā // SkP_29.136 //
GP12skp031pu:3134: mā krudho devi yakṣasya bhaktasyāsya tapasvinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3135: yaśasvī dhārmikaścāyaṃ bhaktastvāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // SkP_29.138 //
GP12skp031pu:3137: prasādaṃ kuru bālasya dhanadasya maheśvari // SkP_29.139 //
GP12skp031pu:3139: minoti na guṇāndeva kasmānmama puraḥ sthitaḥ // SkP_29.140 //
GP12skp031pu:3142: sanatkumāra uvāca tāmevaṃ krodhatāmrākṣīṃ kruddhāṃ samprekṣya śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3143: uvāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ girīndratanayāṃ vacaḥ // SkP_29.142 //
GP12skp031pu:3144: bravīmi tvāṃ mahābhāge mā krudho jagato 'raṇi /
GP12skp031pu:3146: putraste 'yaṃ yato devi tasmānna kroddhumarhasi // SkP_29.143 //
GP12skp031pu:3148: na doṣo 'sti na caivāsya tvayi ceto vimohitam // SkP_29.144 //
GP12skp031pu:3150: prasādaṃ kuru deveśe kuberasya yathepsitam // SkP_29.145 //
GP12skp031pu:3151: sanatkumāra uvāca sā tathā devadevena proktā girivarātmajā /
GP12skp031pu:3153: devyuvāca kubera yatte duritaṃ kṣāntaṃ tatte mayānagha /
GP12skp031pu:3155: yattvidaṃ te mayā dagdham īkṣamāṇasya locanam /
GP12skp031pu:3156: vāmaṃ tathaiva bhavatu piṅgalaṃ dīptimacca ha // SkP_29.148 //
GP12skp031pu:3157: anena cāṅkito loke bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3158: ekākṣipiṅgalo nāmnā khyātaḥ sarvatra pūjitaḥ // SkP_29.149 //
GP12skp031pu:3161: sanatkumāra uvāca evamuktvā tato devī virarāma śubhānanā /
GP12skp031pu:3164: tuṣṭāva devaṃ devīṃ ca śirasā prāñjalirnataḥ // SkP_29.152 //
GP12skp031pu:3166: namo valayadhāriṇyai dhāriṇyai darpaṇasya ca // SkP_29.153 //
GP12skp031pu:3168: namo mekhaladhāriṇyai namo mauñjīdharāya ca // SkP_29.154 //
GP12skp031pu:3170: namo jñānāya tanave bhūtādhipataye namaḥ // SkP_29.155 //
GP12skp031pu:3173: namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva namo 'stu puruṣāya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3174: namo 'stu buddhaye caiva ahaṃkārāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.157 //
GP12skp031pu:3175: namo 'stu rataye caiva sukhāya ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3176: namaḥ kīrtyai karmaṇe ca ārambhāya samāptaye // SkP_29.158 //
GP12skp031pu:3177: namo yajñāya mantrāya dakṣiṇāyai ṛce namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3178: namaḥ sāmne 'tha yajuṣe chandase ceṣṭaye namaḥ // SkP_29.159 //
GP12skp031pu:3179: namo 'gnaye ca vedyai ca svāhāyai haviṣe namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3180: namo lakṣmyai śriyai caiva namo dharmāya vedhase // SkP_29.160 //
GP12skp031pu:3182: namaḥ siddhyai tathā puṣṭyai tuṣṭyai kṣāntyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.161 //
GP12skp031pu:3183: namaḥ svadhāyai kavyāya havyāya ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3184: namo vedyāya vidyāyai namaḥ śarvāya bhaktaye // SkP_29.162 //
GP12skp031pu:3186: mokṣāya muktaye caiva namaḥ kālāya mṛtyave // SkP_29.163 //
GP12skp031pu:3188: diśa no bhūtabhavyeśa yanme manasi saṃsthitam // SkP_29.164 //
GP12skp031pu:3189: sanatkumāra uvāca ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ stavaṃ prātaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3190: japaṃśca vipro vaiśyo vā śūdraḥ kṣatriya eva vā // SkP_29.165 //
GP12skp031pu:3193: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ sa saṃstutastena kubereṇa jagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3194: uvāca varado 'smīti brūhi viśravasaḥ suta // SkP_29.167 //
GP12skp031pu:3195: kubera uvāca tvattaḥ prasādaḥ satataṃ bhaktiśca tvayi śāśvatī /
GP12skp031pu:3196: bhagavaṃstvāṃ ca paśyeyaṃ vara eṣo 'stu me vibho // SkP_29.168 //
GP12skp031pu:3198: ātmanā saha sakhyaṃ ca dadāvātyantikaṃ tadā // SkP_29.169 //
GP12skp031pu:3199: deva uvāca gṛhāṇa cemāṃ śibikāṃ narayuktāmasaṅginīm /
GP12skp031pu:3203: astraṃ ca te prayacchāmi tava nāmnā bhaviṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:3205: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa devastuṣṭātmā mālāṃ svayamaninditām /
GP12skp031pu:3208: ābabaddhāsya kaṇṭhe vai prīyamāṇa umāpatiḥ // SkP_29.174 //
GP12skp031pu:3209: prakāmaṃ darśanaṃ cāsya dattvā caiva dhaneśatām /
GP12skp031pu:3211: sanatkumāra uvāca ya imaṃ tu kuberasya varadānamaśeṣataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3214: kulajñānabalopeto jāyate sa mṛto naraḥ // SkP_29.177 //
GP12skp031pu:3215: atha devī mahābhāgā sahitā śambhunā tadā /
GP12skp031pu:3224: tvāṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyante vara ābhyaḥ pradīyatām // SkP_29.181 //
GP12skp031pu:3226: pañcacūḍāḥ samāgamya vaca etaduvāca ha // SkP_29.182 //
GP12skp031pu:3228: dadāni vo varāniṣṭāny evo hṛdayasaṃsthitāḥ // SkP_29.183 //
GP12skp031pu:3229: sanatkumāra uvāca tā evamuktāḥ pārvatyā vaidikyo 'psarasaḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3230: devīṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamyaiva śirasā pādayornatāḥ // SkP_29.184 //
GP12skp031pu:3233: namaḥ siddhyai namastuṣṭyai kriyāyai buddhaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3234: namaḥ kīrtyai namaḥ satyai ulkajāyai tatheṣṭaye // SkP_29.186 //
GP12skp031pu:3235: namaḥ pṛthivyai kalyāṇyai śriyai lakṣmyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3236: namaḥ sudhāyai svāhāyai svadhāyai ditaye namaḥ // SkP_29.187 //
GP12skp031pu:3237: namo 'stu taḍite caiva saudāmanyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3238: sāvitryai cātha gāyatryai vedamātre namo namaḥ // SkP_29.188 //
GP12skp031pu:3240: namaḥ parvatavāsinyai rudrāṇyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.189 //
GP12skp031pu:3241: namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva jyotsnāyai ṛddhaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3243: gatyāyai gataye caiva indrāṇyai muktaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3244: niyatyai sarite caiva gaṅgāyai sūtaye namaḥ // SkP_29.191 //
GP12skp031pu:3246: namaḥ saṃnataye caiva irāyai vṛttaye namaḥ // SkP_29.192 //
GP12skp031pu:3247: vāruṇyai ca śaraṇyāyai gauryai kālyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3248: kauśikyai ca namaste 'stu kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.193 //
GP12skp031pu:3249: namaḥ saṃnataye caiva mahimne ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3250: aṇimāyai namaste 'stu laghimāyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.194 //
GP12skp031pu:3251: pūjāyai te namaste 'stu śitibāhve ca sṛptaye /
GP12skp031pu:3252: saṃjñāyai ca namaste 'stu gire 'tha smṛtaye namaḥ // SkP_29.195 //
GP12skp031pu:3255: namaḥ siṃharathinyai ca śūlinyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3256: namo mudgaradhāriṇyai kavacinyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.197 //
GP12skp031pu:3258: namo dhanurdharāyai ca khaḍginyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.198 //
GP12skp031pu:3259: namaḥ piñcchadhvajinyai ca dhāriṇyai paṭṭisasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3260: namo 'stu bhūtamātre ca skandasya ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.199 //
GP12skp031pu:3262: jātyai sarvarasānāṃ ca devatāyai vanasya ca // SkP_29.200 //
GP12skp031pu:3263: āryāyai ca namo nityaṃ śikhaṇḍinyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3264: namo nīlaśikhaṇḍinyai dīrghaveṇyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.201 //
GP12skp031pu:3266: namo dhṛtyai namaścityai kīrtaye ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.202 //
GP12skp031pu:3267: strīṇāṃ saubhāgyadāyinyai dhāriṇyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3268: rākānumataye caiva sinīvālyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.203 //
GP12skp031pu:3269: namaḥ kriyāyai śraddhāyai medhāyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3270: namo 'stu dhāraṇāyai ca ūhāyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.204 //
GP12skp031pu:3272: namaḥ samādhaye caiva spṛhāyai vittaye namaḥ // SkP_29.205 //
GP12skp031pu:3274: namaḥ prabhāyai śuddhāyai śuddhaye śucaye namaḥ // SkP_29.206 //
GP12skp031pu:3276: dīkṣāyai dakṣiṇāyai ca jvālāyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.207 //
GP12skp031pu:3277: indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttyai ca nivṛttyai caiva karmaṇām /
GP12skp031pu:3278: śrutaye sarvavedānāṃ bhavānyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.208 //
GP12skp031pu:3281: namaḥ śāntyai namaḥ kāntyai namaḥ patnyai harasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3282: namo 'stvadityai dānavyai vinatāyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.210 //
GP12skp031pu:3283: namaḥ śivāyai kartryai ca prabhāvāyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3284: mṛkaṇḍvai mārdabāhvai ca tathā surataye namaḥ // SkP_29.211 //
GP12skp031pu:3285: vinatāyai tathā lakṣmyai surasāyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3287: diśa naḥ sumanāḥ sarvaṃ yatkiṃciddhṛdaye sthitam // SkP_29.212 //
GP12skp031pu:3288: sanatkumāra uvāca ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ naraḥ strī vā samāhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3289: sa rātriṣu kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tyajetsarvamaśeṣataḥ // SkP_29.213 //
GP12skp031pu:3290: śayāno japate yaśca prayato vyāsa nityaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3291: divākṛtaṃ sa jahyāttu mṛtaśca sugatiṃ vrajet // SkP_29.214 //
GP12skp031pu:3300: sa bhūtvānucaro devyāḥ puṇye loke mahīyate // SkP_29.218 //
GP12skp031pu:3301: sanatkumāra uvāca tābhirevaṃ stutā devī sthitā devasya saṃnidhau /
GP12skp031pu:3304: yaccāpi parayā bhaktyā māṃ prapannāḥ stha śobhanāḥ // SkP_29.220 //
GP12skp031pu:3308: sarvaṃ dāsyāmi tadvo 'haṃ mā cirāya taducyatām // SkP_29.222 //
GP12skp031pu:3309: pañcacūḍā ūcuḥ devi puṃsāṃ striyaḥ sarvāḥ kāryārthaṃ viditaṃ ca te /
GP12skp031pu:3311: samāpte caiva tatkārye parā iva bhavanti naḥ // SkP_29.223 //
GP12skp031pu:3312: taddevi yadi tuṣṭāsi yadi deyo varaśca naḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3313: sarvastrīṇāṃ mahādevi bhavantu puruṣā vaśāḥ // SkP_29.224 //
GP12skp031pu:3314: devyuvāca adyaprabhṛti lokeṣu sarvastrīṇāṃ narāḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:3315: sarve vaśyā bhaviṣyanti sarvakāryakarāśca ha // SkP_29.225 //
GP12skp031pu:3316: ādau paścācca sarvābhyo hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3317: sarvabhogāṃśca dāsyantu vaśagāḥ sarvathāpi ca // SkP_29.226 //
GP12skp031pu:3319: priyā eva bhaviṣyanti pāpaṃ na ca bhavetsadā // SkP_29.227 //
GP12skp031pu:3323: naiva drakṣyanti te puṃso madvarānmohitendriyāḥ // SkP_29.229 //
GP12skp031pu:3324: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sā devadevasya patnī himavataḥ sutā /
GP12skp031pu:3326: bhava nārya iti prāha hasantī priyamavyayā // SkP_29.230 //
GP12skp031pu:3333: narāḥ sarve ca yuṣmāsu bhaviṣyanti sadā ratāḥ // SkP_29.233 //
GP12skp031pu:3334: vṛttiḥ śubhā bhavitrī ca sarvāsāṃ mama tejasā /
GP12skp031pu:3335: puṃsāṃ strībhogasiddhyarthaṃ strīṇāṃ ratyarthameva ca // SkP_29.234 //
GP12skp031pu:3336: kriyāḥ śubhāṅgasaṃskārā divyā ye mānuṣāśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:3337: bahurūpāśca tā bhūtvā viviśuḥ sarvadāṅganāḥ // SkP_29.235 //
GP12skp031pu:3338: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ devī tadā vyāsa sṛṣṭvā tā vai visṛjya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3339: uvācāpsaraso brūta kiṃ vo bhūyaḥ karomyaham // SkP_29.236 //
GP12skp031pu:3342: tā uvāca tato devī evaṃ loke bhaviṣyatu // SkP_29.237 //
GP12skp031pu:3343: tataḥ sa sahito devyā sanandī parameśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3348: vyāsa uvāca bhagavanpiṅgalaḥ kena gaṇatvaṃ samupāgataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3349: annadatvaṃ ca samprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ mahādyutiḥ // SkP_30.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3350: kṣetrapālaḥ kathaṃ jātaḥ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ gataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3351: etadicchāmi kathitaṃ śrotuṃ brahmasuta tvayā // SkP_30.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3352: sanatkumāra uvāca śṛṇu vyāsa yathā lebhe gaṇeśatvaṃ sa piṅgalaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3353: annadatvaṃ ca lokānāṃ sthānaṃ vārāṇasīṃ ca hi // SkP_30.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3355: harikeśa iti khyāto brahmaṇyo dhārmikaśca ha // SkP_30.4 //
GP12skp031pu:3361: na tvā putramahaṃ manye durjāto yastvamanyathā // SkP_30.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3365: maivaṃ kārṣīrna no vṛttir evaṃ dṛṣṭā mahātmanām /
GP12skp031pu:3366: svayambhuvā yathā sṛṣṭā saiva vṛttiḥ praśasyate // SkP_30.9 //
GP12skp031pu:3367: harikeśa uvāca duṣṭā caivāpraśastā ca garhitā sādhubhiḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:3368: vṛttiḥ svayambhuvā sṛṣṭā tyaktavyā yadi no bhavet /
GP12skp031pu:3371: devatvaṃ no vimārgeyur mānuṣyāṃ jātimeva ca // SkP_30.11 //
GP12skp031pu:3373: mamāpi vihitaṃ paśya karmaitannātra saṃśayaḥ // SkP_30.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3374: sanatkumāra uvāca sa evamuktaḥ putreṇa pūrṇabhadraḥ pratāpavān /
GP12skp031pu:3375: uvāca niṣkrama kṣipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ yatra rocate // SkP_30.13 //
GP12skp031pu:3388: kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me /
GP12skp031pu:3392: nirjagāma ca deveśaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3393: udyānaṃ darśayāmāsa devyā devaḥ pinākadhṛk // SkP_30.22 //
GP12skp031pu:3395: virūḍhapuṣpaiḥ paritaḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ kaṇṭakitaiśca ketakaiḥ //
GP12skp031pu:3417: rātrau candrasya bhāsā kusumitatilakairekatāṃ samprayātaṃ chāyāsuptaprabuddhasthitahariṇakulāluptadarbhāṅkurāgram haṃsānāṃ pakṣavātapracalitakamalasvacchavistīrṇatoyaṃ toyānāṃ tīrajātapravikacakadalīvāṭanṛtyanmayūram
GP12skp031pu:3418: māyūraiḥ pakṣacandraiḥ kvacidapi patitai rañjitakṣmāpradeśaṃ deśe deśe nilīnapramuditavilasanmattahārītavṛndam sāraṅgaiḥ kvacidupasevitapradeśaṃ saṃchannaṃ kusumacayaiḥ kvacidvicitraiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3433: vividhataruviśālaṃ mattahṛṣṭānyapuṣṭam upavanamatiramyaṃ darśayāmāsa devyāḥ // SkP_30.43 //
GP12skp031pu:3434: devyuvāca udyānaṃ darśitaṃ deva śobhayā parayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:3437: śrutvāpi na hi me tṛptir ato bhūyo vadasva me // SkP_30.45 //
GP12skp031pu:3438: deva uvāca idaṃ guhyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ sadā vārāṇasī mama /
GP12skp031pu:3442: abhyasyanti paraṃ yogaṃ yuktātmāno jitendriyāḥ // SkP_30.47 //
GP12skp031pu:3446: rocate me sadāvāso yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu // SkP_30.49 //
GP12skp031pu:3448: yathā mokṣamihāpnoti anyatra na tathā kvacit // SkP_30.50 //
GP12skp031pu:3450: brahmādayo vijānanti ye ca siddhā mumukṣavaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3451: ataḥ priyamidaṃ kṣetram asmācceha ratirmama // SkP_30.51 //
GP12skp031pu:3452: vimuktaṃ na mayā yasmān mokṣyate vā kadācana /
GP12skp031pu:3453: mama kṣetramidaṃ tasmād avimuktamiti smṛtam // SkP_30.52 //
GP12skp031pu:3456: iha samprāpyate yena tata etadviśiṣyate // SkP_30.53 //
GP12skp031pu:3457: prayāge vā bhavenmokṣa iha vā matparigrahāt /
GP12skp031pu:3459: jaigīṣavyaḥ parāṃ siddhiṃ yo gataḥ sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3460: asya kṣetrasya māhātmyād bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ // SkP_30.55 //
GP12skp031pu:3463: kaivalyaṃ paramaṃ yāti devānāmapi durlabham // SkP_30.56 //
GP12skp031pu:3465: iha samprāpyate mokṣo durlabho 'nyatra karhicit // SkP_30.57 //
GP12skp031pu:3467: ātmanaścaiva sāyujyam īpsitaṃ sthānameva ca // SkP_30.58 //
GP12skp031pu:3470: saṃvarto bhavitā yaśca so 'pi bhaktyā mamaiva tu /
GP12skp031pu:3471: ihaivārādhya māṃ devi siddhiṃ yāsyatyanuttamām // SkP_30.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3477: upāsate mahātmānaḥ sarve māmiha suvrate // SkP_30.62 //
GP12skp031pu:3478: anye ca yoginaḥ siddhāś channarūpā mahāvrate /
GP12skp031pu:3482: sphītāṃ janapadākīrṇāṃ bhuktvā ca suciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3488: iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ so 'pi saṃsāraṃ na punarviśet // SkP_30.67 //
GP12skp031pu:3490: vratinaśca nirārambhāḥ sarvato mayi bhāvitāḥ // SkP_30.68 //
GP12skp031pu:3492: gatā eva paraṃ mokṣaṃ prasādānmama suvrate // SkP_30.69 //
GP12skp031pu:3496: avimuktasya kathitaṃ mayā te guhyamuttamam // SkP_30.71 //
GP12skp031pu:3498: etadbudhyanti yogajñā ye ca yogīśvarā bhuvi // SkP_30.72 //
GP12skp031pu:3499: etadeva paraṃ jñānam etadeva paraṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:3500: etadeva paraṃ brahma etadeva paraṃ padam // SkP_30.73 //
GP12skp031pu:3501: vārāṇasīti bhuvanatrayasārabhūtā ramyā purī mama sadā girirājaputri /
GP12skp031pu:3503: etatsmṛtaṃ priyatamaṃ mama devi nityaṃ kṣetraṃ vicitratarugulmanikāmapuṣpam /
GP12skp031pu:3504: asminmṛtāstanubhṛtaḥ padamāpnuvanti mokṣākhyamenasi ratāpi na saṃśayo 'tra
GP12skp031pu:3506: sanatkumāra uvāca etasminnantare devo devīṃ prāha girīndrajām /
GP12skp031pu:3507: prayāma dātuṃ yakṣāya varaṃ bhaktāya bhāvini // SkP_31.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3509: arho varamasau labdham asmatto bhuvaneśvari // SkP_31.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3510: evamuktvā tato devaḥ saha devyā jagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3511: jagāma yakṣo yatrāste kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ // SkP_31.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3512: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ bhaktyā harikeśaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3514: sanatkumāra uvāca atha yakṣastadā vyāsa śanairunmīlya locane /
GP12skp031pu:3516: deva uvāca balaṃ dadāni te pūrvaṃ traikālyaṃ darśanaṃ tathā /
GP12skp031pu:3517: sāvarṇyaṃ ca śarīrasya paśya māṃ vigatajvaraḥ // SkP_31.6 //
GP12skp031pu:3518: sanatkumāra uvāca tataḥ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ śarīreṇākṣatena ca /
GP12skp031pu:3519: pādayoḥ praṇatastasthau kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim // SkP_31.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3520: uvāca sa tadā yakṣo varado 'smīti coditaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3521: bhagavanbhaktimagryāṃ tu tvayyananyāṃ vidhatsva me // SkP_31.8 //
GP12skp031pu:3523: avimukte ca te sthāne paśyeyaṃ sarvadā yathā /
GP12skp031pu:3530: tryakṣaśca daṇḍapāṇiśca mahāyogī tathaiva ca // SkP_31.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3533: sanatkumāra uvāca evaṃ sa bhagavānvyāsa yakṣaṃ kṛtvā gaṇeśvaram /
GP12skp031pu:3534: jagāma dhāma deveśaḥ saha tena sureśvaraḥ // SkP_31.14 //
